text.834: [03] 50^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa ruupakkhandho uppajjati tassa vedanaakkhandho  uppajjatiiti?
text.835: [03] asa~n~nasatta.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m ruupakkhandho uppajjati, no ca  tesa.m vedanaakkhandho uppajjati. pa~ncavokaara.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m  ruupakkhandho ca uppajjati vedanaakkhandho ca uppajjati.
text.836: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana vedanaakkhandho uppajjati tassa  ruupakkhandho uppajjatiiti?
text.837: [03] aruupa.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m vedanaakkhandho uppajjati, no ca tesa.m  ruupakkhandho uppajjati. pa~ncavokaara.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m vedanaakkhandho  ca uppajjati ruupakkhandho ca uppajjati.

text.1173: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana vedanaakkhandho nirujjhissati tassa  ruupakkhandho nirujjhatiiti?

text.1175: [03] 134^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa vedanaakkhandho nirujjhati tassa  sa~n~naakkhandho nirujjhissatiiti?
text.1176: [03] parinibbantaana.m tesa.m vedanaakkhandho nirujjhati, no ca tesa.m  sa~n~naakkhandho nirujjhissati. itaresa.m catuvokaaraa pa~ncavokaaraa  cavantaana.m tesa.m vedanaakkhandho ca nirujjhati sa~n~naakkhandho ca  nirujjhissati.
text.1177: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana sa~n~naakkhandho nirujjhissati tassa  vedanaakkhandho nirujjhatiiti?
text.1178: [03] sabbesa.m upapajjantaana.m asa~n~nasattaa cavantaana.m tesa.m sa~n~naakkhandho  nirujjhissati, no ca tesa.m vedanaakkhandho nirujjhati. catuvokaaraa  pa~ncavokaaraa cavantaana.m tesa.m sa~n~naakkhandho ca nirujjhissati  vedanaakkhandho nirujjhati.
text.1182: [03] 136^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa yattha ruupakkhandho nirujjhati tassa tattha  vedanaakkhandho nirujjhissatiiti?
text.1183: [03] pa~ncavokaare parinibbantaana.m asa~n~nasattaa cavantaana.m tesa.m tattha  ruupakkhandho nirujjhati, no ca tesa.m tattha vedanaakkhandho ^a^T1.0065^ea^  nirujjhissati. itaresa.m pa~ncavokaaraa cavantaana.m tesa.m tattha  ruupakkhandho ca nirujjhati vedanaakkhandho ca nirujjhissati.
text.1184: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha vedanaakkhandho nirujjhissati tassa  tattha ruupakkhandho nirujjhatiiti?

text.1186: [03] 137^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa yattha vedanaakkhandho nirujjhati tassa  tattha sa~n~naakkhandho nirujjhissatiiti?
text.1187: [03] parinibbantaana.m tesa.m tattha vedanaakkhandho nirujjhati, no ca  tesa.m ^a^M1.0053^ea^ tattha sa~n~naakkhandho nirujjhissati. itaresa.m catuvokaaraa  pa~ncavokaaraa cavantaana.m tesa.m tattha vedanaakkhandho ca nirujjhati  sa~n~naakkhandho ca nirujjhissati.
text.1188: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha sa~n~naakkhandho nirujjhissati tassa  tattha vedanaakkhandho nirujjhatiiti?
text.1189: [03] catuvokaara.m pa~ncavokaara.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha sa~n~naakkhandho  nirujjhissati, no ca tesa.m tattha vedanaakkhandho nirujjhati.  catuvokaaraa ^a^V1.0082^ea^ pa~ncavokaaraa cavantaana.m tesa.m tattha sa~n~naakkhandho ca  nirujjhissati vedanaakkhandho ca nirujjhati.
text.1191: [03] 138^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa ruupakkhandho na nirujjhati tassa  vedanaakkhandho na nirujjhissatiiti?
text.1192: [03] sabbesa.m upapajjantaana.m aruupaa cavantaana.m tesa.m ruupakkhandho na  nirujjhati, no ca tesa.m vedanaakkhandho na nirujjhissati. aruupe ^a^T1.0066^ea^  parinibbantaana.m tesa.m ruupakkhandho ca na nirujjhati vedanaakkhandho ca  na nirujjhissati.
text.1193: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana vedanaakkhandho na nirujjhissati tassa  ruupakkhandho na nirujjhatiiti?
text.1194: [03] pa~ncavokaare parinibbantaana.m tesa.m vedanaakkhandho na  nirujjhissati, no ca tesa.m ruupakkhandho na nirujjhati. aruupe  parinibbantaana.m tesa.m vedanaakkhandho ca na nirujjhissati ruupakkhandho  ca na nirujjhati.
text.1195: [03] 139^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa vedanaakkhandho na nirujjhati tassa  sa~n~naakkhandho na nirujjhissatiiti? nirujjhissati.
text.1196: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana sa~n~naakkhandho na nirujjhissati tassa  vedanaakkhandho na nirujjhatiiti? nirujjhati.

text.1204: [03] 142^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa ^a^T1.0067^ea^ yattha vedanaakkhandho na nirujjhati tassa  tattha sa~n~naakkhandho na nirujjhissatiiti?

text.1454: [03] (ka) yo ruupakkhandha.m na parijaanaati so vedanaakkhandha.m na  parijaanissatiiti?
text.1455: [03] ye magga.m pa.tilabhissanti te ruupakkhandha.m na parijaananti, no  ca vedanaakkhandha.m na parijaanissanti. arahaa ye ca puthujjanaa magga.m  na pa.tilabhissanti te ruupakkhandha~nca na parijaananti vedanaakkhandha~nca  na parijaanissanti.
text.1456: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana vedanaakkhandha.m na parijaanissati so  ruupakkhandha.m na parijaanaatiiti?
text.1457: [03] aggamaggasama"ngii vedanaakkhandha.m na parijaanissati, no ^a^T1.0087^ea^ ca  ruupakkhandha.m na parijaanaati. arahaa ye ca puthujjanaa magga.m na  pa.tilabhissanti te vedanaakkhandha~nca na parijaanissanti  ruupakkhandha~nca na parijaananti.
text.1459: [03] 211^b^.^eb^ (ka) yo ^a^V1.0106^ea^ ^a^M1.0070^ea^ ruupakkhandha.m parijaanittha so vedanaakkhandha.m  parijaanissatiiti? no.
text.1460: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana vedanaakkhandha.m parijaanissati so  ruupakkhandha.m parijaanitthaati? no.
text.1461: [03] (ka) yo ruupakkhandha.m na parijaanittha so vedanaakkhandha.m na  parijaanissatiiti?
text.1462: [03] ye magga.m pa.tilabhissanti te ruupakkhandha.m na parijaanittha, no  ca vedanaakkhandha.m na parijaanissanti. aggamaggasama"ngii ye ca  puthujjanaa magga.m na pa.tilabhissanti te ruupakkhandha~nca na parijaanittha  vedanaakkhandha~nca na parijaanissanti.
text.1463: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana vedanaakkhandha.m na parijaanissati so  ruupakkhandha.m na parijaanitthaati?
text.1464: [03] arahaa vedanaakkhandha.m na parijaanissati, no ca ruupakkhandha.m na  parijaanittha. aggamaggasama"ngii ye ca puthujjanaa magga.m na  pa.tilabhissanti te vedanaakkhandha~nca na parijaanissanti  ruupakkhandha~nca na parijaanittha.

text.1832: [03] 18^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa cakkhaayatana.m uppajjati tassa sotaayatana.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.1833: [03] sacakkhukaana.m asotakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m cakkhaayatana.m  uppajjati ^a^V1.0125^ea^, no ca tesa.m sotaayatana.m uppajjati. sacakkhukaana.m  sasotakaana.m upapajjantaana.m ^a^M1.0082^ea^ tesa.m cakkhaayatana~nca uppajjati sotaayatana~nca  uppajjati.
text.1834: [03] (kha) yassa ^a^T1.0098^ea^ vaa pana sotaayatana.m uppajjati tassa cakkhaayatana.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.1835: [03] sasotakaana.m acakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m sotaayatana.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m cakkhaayatana.m uppajjati. sasotakaana.m  sacakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m sotaayatana~nca uppajjati  cakkhaayatana~nca uppajjati.

text.1838: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana ghaanaayatana.m uppajjati tassa cakkhaayatana.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.1839: [03] saghaanakaana.m acakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m ghaanaayatana.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m cakkhaayatana.m uppajjati. saghaanakaana.m  sacakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m ghaanaayatana~nca uppajjati  cakkhaayatana~nca uppajjati.
text.1840: [03] (ka) yassa cakkhaayatana.m uppajjati tassa ruupaayatana.m  uppajjatiiti? aamantaa.

text.1846: [03] (ka) yassa cakkhaayatana.m uppajjati tassa dhammaayatana.m  uppajjatiiti? aamantaa.

text.1848: [03] acakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m dhammaayatana.m uppajjati, no ca  tesa.m cakkhaayatana.m uppajjati. sacakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m  dhammaayatana~nca uppajjati cakkhaayatana~nca uppajjati.  (cakkhaayatanamuulaka.m)

text.1857: [03] aghaanakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m dhammaayatana.m uppajjati, no ^a^T1.0100^ea^ ca  tesa.m ghaanaayatana.m uppajjati. saghaanakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m  dhammaayatana~nca uppajjati ghaanaayatana~nca uppajjati.  (ghaanaayatanamuulaka.m)

text.1876: [03] asa~n~nasatte tattha ruupaayatana.m uppajjati, no ca tattha  cakkhaayatana.m uppajjati. pa~ncavokaare tattha ruupaayatana~nca uppajjati  cakkhaayatana~nca uppajjati.

text.2314: [03] sabbesa.m ^a^V1.0166^ea^ cavantaana.m acakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m dhammaayatana.m  uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m cakkhaayatana.m uppajjati. sacakkhukaana.m  upapajjantaana.m tesa.m dhammaayatana~nca uppajjissati cakkhaayatana~nca  uppajjati. (cakkhaayatanamuulaka.m)

text.2317: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana ruupaayatana.m uppajjissati tassa  ghaanaayatana.m uppajjatiiti?

text.2395: [03] (ka) yassa cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjati tassa ruupaayatana.m  nuppajjissatiiti?
text.2396: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m acakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m cakkhaayatana.m  nuppajjati, no ca tesa.m ruupaayatana.m nuppajjissati. pa~ncavokaare  parinibbantaana.m aruupe pacchimabhavikaana.m ye ca aruupa.m upapajjitvaa  parinibbaayissanti tesa.m cavantaana.m tesa.m cakkhaayatana~nca nuppajjati  ruupaayatana~nca nuppajjissati.
text.2397: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana ruupaayatana.m nuppajjissati ^a^T1.0152^ea^ tassa  cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjatiiti?
text.2398: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m pa~ncavokaara.m upapajjantaana.m ye ca aruupa.m  upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti tesa.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m ruupaayatana.m  nuppajjissati, no ca tesa.m cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjati. pa~ncavokaare  parinibbantaana.m aruupe pacchimabhavikaana.m ye ca aruupa.m upapajjitvaa  parinibbaayissanti tesa.m cavantaana.m tesa.m ruupaayatana~nca nuppajjissati  cakkhaayatana~nca nuppajjati.
text.2399: [03] (ka) yassa cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjati tassa manaayatana.m  nuppajjissatiiti?
text.2400: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m acakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m cakkhaayatana.m  nuppajjati, no ^a^M1.0118^ea^ ca tesa.m manaayatana.m nuppajjissati. pa~ncavokaare  parinibbantaana.m aruupe pacchimabhavikaana.m tesa.m cakkhaayatana~nca nuppajjati  manaayatana~nca nuppajjissati.
text.2401: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana manaayatana.m nuppajjissati tassa  cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjatiiti?
text.2402: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m pa~ncavokaara.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m manaayatana.m  nuppajjissati, no ca tesa.m cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjati. pa~ncavokaare  parinibbantaana.m aruupe pacchimabhavikaana.m tesa.m manaayatana~nca  nuppajjissati cakkhaayatana~nca nuppajjati.
text.2403: [03] (ka) yassa ^a^V1.0175^ea^ cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjati tassa dhammaayatana.m  nuppajjissatiiti ^a^T1.0153^ea^?
text.2404: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m acakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m cakkhaayatana.m  nuppajjati, no ca tesa.m dhammaayatana.m nuppajjissati. pa~ncavokaare  parinibbantaana.m aruupe pacchimabhavikaana.m tesa.m cakkhaayatana~nca nuppajjati  dhammaayatana~nca nuppajjissati.
text.2405: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana dhammaayatana.m nuppajjissati tassa  cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjatiiti?
text.2406: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m pa~ncavokaara.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m dhammaayatana.m  nuppajjissati, no ca tesa.m cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjati. pa~ncavokaare  parinibbantaana.m aruupe pacchimabhavikaana.m tesa.m dhammaayatana~nca  nuppajjissati cakkhaayatana~nca nuppajjati. (cakkhaayatanamuulaka.m)
text.2407: [03] 96^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa ghaanaayatana.m nuppajjati tassa ruupaayatana.m  nuppajjissatiiti?
text.2408: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m aghaanakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m ghaanaayatana.m  nuppajjati, no ca tesa.m ruupaayatana.m nuppajjissati. kaamaavacare  parinibbantaana.m ^a^T1.0154^ea^ ruupaavacare aruupaavacare pacchimabhavikaana.m ye ca aruupa.m  upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti tesa.m ^a^M1.0119^ea^ cavantaana.m tesa.m ghaanaayatana~nca  nuppajjati ruupaayatana~nca nuppajjissati.
text.2409: [03] (kha) yassa ^a^V1.0176^ea^ vaa pana ruupaayatana.m nuppajjissati tassa  ghaanaayatana.m nuppajjatiiti?
text.2410: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m ye ca aruupa.m  upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti tesa.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m ruupaayatana.m  nuppajjissati, no ca tesa.m ghaanaayatana.m nuppajjati. kaamaavacare  parinibbantaana.m ruupaavacare aruupaavacare pacchimabhavikaana.m ye ca aruupa.m  upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti tesa.m cavantaana.m tesa.m ruupaayatana~nca  nuppajjissati ghaanaayatana~nca nuppajjati.
text.2411: [03] yassa ghaanaayatana.m nuppajjati  tassa manaayatana.m...pe0... dhammaayatana.m nuppajjissatiiti?
text.2412: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m aghaanakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m ghaanaayatana.m  nuppajjati, no ca tesa.m dhammaayatana.m nuppajjissati. kaamaavacare  parinibbantaana.m ruupaavacare aruupaavacare pacchimabhavikaana.m tesa.m  ghaanaayatana~nca nuppajjati dhammaayatana~nca nuppajjissati.
text.2413: [03] yassa vaa pana dhammaayatana.m nuppajjissati tassa ghaanaayatana.m nuppajjatiiti?
text.2414: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m dhammaayatana.m  nuppajjissati, no ca tesa.m ghaanaayatana.m nuppajjati. kaamaavacare  parinibbantaana.m ruupaavacare aruupaavacare pacchimabhavikaana.m tesa.m  dhammaayatana~nca nuppajjissati ghaanaayatana~nca nuppajjati.  (ghaanaayatanamuulaka.m)
text.2415: [03] 97^b^.^eb^ yassa ruupaayatana.m nuppajjati tassa manaayatana.m...pe0...  dhammaayatana.m ^a^T1.0155^ea^ nuppajjissatiiti?
text.2416: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m aruupakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m ruupaayatana.m  nuppajjati, no ca tesa.m dhammaayatana.m nuppajjissati. pa~ncavokaare  parinibbantaana.m aruupe pacchimabhavikaana.m tesa.m ruupaayatana~nca nuppajjati  dhammaayatana~nca nuppajjissati.
text.2417: [03] yassa vaa pana dhammaayatana.m nuppajjissati tassa ruupaayatana.m  nuppajjatiiti?
text.2418: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m pa~ncavokaara.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m dhammaayatana.m  nuppajjissati, no ca tesa.m ruupaayatana.m nuppajjati. pa~ncavokaare  parinibbantaana.m aruupe pacchimabhavikaana.m tesa.m dhammaayatana~nca  nuppajjissati ruupaayatana~nca nuppajjati. (ruupaayatanamuulaka.m)
text.2419: [03] 98^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa ^a^V1.0177^ea^ manaayatana.m nuppajjati tassa dhammaayatana.m  nuppajjissatiiti?
text.2420: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m acittakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m manaayatana.m  nuppajjati, no ca tesa.m dhammaayatana.m nuppajjissati. parinibbantaana.m  tesa.m manaayatana~nca nuppajjati dhammaayatana~nca nuppajjissati.
text.2421: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana dhammaayatana.m nuppajjissati tassa  manaayatana.m nuppajjatiiti?
text.2422: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m dhammaayatana.m ^a^M1.0120^ea^ nuppajjissati,  no ca tesa.m manaayatana.m nuppajjati. parinibbantaana.m tesa.m  dhammaayatana~nca nuppajjissati manaayatana~nca nuppajjati.  (manaayatanamuulaka.m)
text.2426: [03] 100^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa yattha cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjati tassa tattha  sotaayatana.m nuppajjissatiiti?
text.2427: [03] pa~ncavokaaraa cavantaana.m acakkhukaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m ^a^T1.0156^ea^  tesa.m tattha cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha sotaayatana.m  nuppajjissati. pa~ncavokaare parinibbantaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m aruupaana.m  tesa.m tattha cakkhaayatana~nca nuppajjati sotaayatana~nca nuppajjissati.
text.2428: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha sotaayatana.m nuppajjissati tassa  tattha cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjatiiti?
text.2429: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m pa~ncavokaara.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  sotaayatana.m nuppajjissati, no ca tesa.m tattha cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjati.  pa~ncavokaare parinibbantaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m aruupaana.m tesa.m tattha  sotaayatana~nca nuppajjissati cakkhaayatana~nca nuppajjati.
text.2430: [03] (ka) yassa ^a^V1.0178^ea^ yattha cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjati tassa tattha  ghaanaayatana.m nuppajjissatiiti?
text.2431: [03] kaamaavacaraa cavantaana.m acakkhukaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m  tesa.m tattha cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha ghaanaayatana.m  nuppajjissati. kaamaavacare parinibbantaana.m ruupaavacaraa cavantaana.m  asa~n~nasattaana.m aruupaana.m tesa.m tattha cakkhaayatana~nca nuppajjati  ghaanaayatana~nca nuppajjissati.
text.2432: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha ghaanaayatana.m nuppajjissati tassa  tattha cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjatiiti?
text.2433: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m ruupaavacara.m  upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha ghaanaayatana.m nuppajjissati, no ca tesa.m tattha  cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjati. kaamaavacare parinibbantaana.m ruupaavacaraa  cavantaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m aruupaana.m tesa.m tattha ghaanaayatana~nca  nuppajjissati cakkhaayatana~nca nuppajjati.
text.2434: [03] (ka) yassa ^a^T1.0157^ea^ yattha cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjati tassa tattha  ruupaayatana.m nuppajjissatiiti?
text.2435: [03] pa~ncavokaaraa cavantaana.m acakkhukaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m  asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m tattha cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha  ruupaayatana.m nuppajjissati. pa~ncavokaare parinibbantaana.m aruupaana.m tesa.m  tattha cakkhaayatana~nca ^a^M1.0121^ea^ nuppajjati ruupaayatana~nca nuppajjissati.
text.2436: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha ruupaayatana.m nuppajjissati tassa  tattha cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjatiiti?
text.2437: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m pa~ncavokaara.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  ruupaayatana.m nuppajjissati, no ca tesa.m tattha cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjati.  pa~ncavokaare parinibbantaana.m aruupaana.m tesa.m tattha ruupaayatana~nca  nuppajjissati cakkhaayatana~nca nuppajjati.
text.2438: [03] (ka) yassa yattha cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjati tassa tattha  manaayatana.m nuppajjissatiiti?
text.2439: [03] pa~ncavokaaraa ^a^V1.0179^ea^ cavantaana.m acakkhukaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m  aruupaana.m tesa.m tattha cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha  manaayatana.m nuppajjissati. pa~ncavokaare parinibbantaana.m aruupe  pacchimabhavikaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m tattha cakkhaayatana~nca nuppajjati  manaayatana~nca nuppajjissati.
text.2440: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha manaayatana.m nuppajjissati tassa  tattha cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjatiiti?
text.2441: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m pa~ncavokaara.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  manaayatana.m nuppajjissati, no ca tesa.m tattha cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjati.  pa~ncavokaare parinibbantaana.m aruupe pacchimabhavikaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m  tesa.m tattha manaayatana.m nuppajjissati ^a^T1.0158^ea^ cakkhaayatana~nca nuppajjati.
text.2442: [03] (ka) yassa yattha cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjati tassa tattha  dhammaayatana.m nuppajjissatiiti?
text.2443: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m acakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha dhammaayatana.m nuppajjissati.  pa~ncavokaare parinibbantaana.m aruupe pacchimabhavikaana.m tesa.m tattha  cakkhaayatana~nca nuppajjati dhammaayatana~nca nuppajjissati.
text.2444: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha dhammaayatana.m nuppajjissati tassa  tattha cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjatiiti?
text.2445: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m pa~ncavokaara.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  dhammaayatana.m nuppajjissati, no ca tesa.m tattha cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjati.  pa~ncavokaare parinibbantaana.m aruupe pacchimabhavikaana.m tesa.m tattha  dhammaayatana~nca nuppajjissati cakkhaayatana~nca nuppajjati.  (cakkhaayatanamuulaka.m)
text.2446: [03] 101^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa yattha ghaanaayatana.m nuppajjati tassa tattha  ruupaayatana.m nuppajjissatiiti?
text.2447: [03] kaamaavacaraa cavantaana.m aghaanakaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m  ruupaavacaraana.m tesa.m tattha ghaanaayatana.m nuppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha  ruupaayatana.m ^a^V1.0180^ea^ nuppajjissati. kaamaavacare parinibbantaana.m ruupaavacare  pacchimabhavikaana.m aruupaana.m tesa.m tattha ghaanaayatana~nca nuppajjati  ruupaayatana~nca nuppajjissati ^a^M1.0122^ea^.
text.2448: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha ruupaayatana.m nuppajjissati tassa  tattha ghaanaayatana.m nuppajjatiiti?
text.2449: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha ruupaayatana.m  nuppajjissati, no ca tesa.m tattha ghaanaayatana.m nuppajjati. kaamaavacare  parinibbantaana.m ruupaavacare ^a^T1.0159^ea^ pacchimabhavikaana.m aruupaana.m tesa.m tattha  ruupaayatana~nca nuppajjissati ghaanaayatana~nca nuppajjati.
text.2450: [03] (ka) yassa yattha ghaanaayatana.m nuppajjati tassa tattha manaayatana.m  nuppajjissatiiti?
text.2451: [03] kaamaavacaraa cavantaana.m aghaanakaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m  ruupaavacaraana.m aruupaavacaraana.m tesa.m tattha ghaanaayatana.m nuppajjati, no ca  tesa.m tattha manaayatana.m nuppajjissati. kaamaavacare parinibbantaana.m  ruupaavacare aruupaavacare pacchimabhavikaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m tattha  ghaanaayatana~nca nuppajjati manaayatana~nca nuppajjissati.
text.2452: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha manaayatana.m nuppajjissati tassa  tattha ghaanaayatana.m nuppajjatiiti?
text.2453: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha manaayatana.m  nuppajjissati, no ca tesa.m tattha ghaanaayatana.m nuppajjati. kaamaavacare  parinibbantaana.m ruupaavacare aruupaavacare pacchimabhavikaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m  tesa.m tattha manaayatana~nca nuppajjissati ghaanaayatana~nca nuppajjati.
text.2454: [03] (ka) yassa yattha ghaanaayatana.m nuppajjati tassa tattha  dhammaayatana.m nuppajjissatiiti?
text.2455: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m aghaanakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  ghaanaayatana.m nuppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha dhammaayatana.m nuppajjissati.  kaamaavacare parinibbantaana.m ruupaavacare aruupaavacare pacchimabhavikaana.m  tesa.m tattha ghaanaayatana~nca nuppajjati dhammaayatana~nca nuppajjissati.
text.2456: [03] (kha) yassa ^a^V1.0181^ea^ vaa pana yattha dhammaayatana.m nuppajjissati tassa  tattha ghaanaayatana.m nuppajjatiiti?
text.2457: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m ^a^T1.0160^ea^ tesa.m tattha  dhammaayatana.m nuppajjissati, no ca tesa.m tattha ghaanaayatana.m nuppajjati.  kaamaavacare parinibbantaana.m ruupaavacare aruupaavacare pacchimabhavikaana.m  tesa.m tattha dhammaayatana~nca nuppajjissati ghaanaayatana~nca nuppajjati.  (ghaanaayatanamuulaka.m)
text.2458: [03] 102^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa yattha ruupaayatana.m nuppajjati tassa tattha  manaayatana.m nuppajjissatiiti?
text.2459: [03] pa~ncavokaaraa cavantaana.m aruupaana.m tesa.m tattha ruupaayatana.m  nuppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha manaayatana.m nuppajjissati. pa~ncavokaare  parinibbantaana.m aruupe pacchimabhavikaana.m asa~n~nasattaa cavantaana.m tesa.m  tattha ruupaayatana~nca ^a^M1.0123^ea^ nuppajjati manaayatana~nca nuppajjissati.
text.2460: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha manaayatana.m nuppajjissati tassa  tattha ruupaayatana.m nuppajjatiiti?
text.2461: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m pa~ncavokaara.m upapajjantaana.m asa~n~nasatta.m  upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha manaayatana.m nuppajjissati, no ca tesa.m tattha  ruupaayatana.m nuppajjati. pa~ncavokaare parinibbantaana.m aruupe  pacchimabhavikaana.m asa~n~nasattaa cavantaana.m tesa.m tattha manaayatana~nca  nuppajjissati ruupaayatana~nca nuppajjati.
text.2462: [03] (ka) yassa yattha ruupaayatana.m nuppajjati tassa tattha dhammaayatana.m  nuppajjissatiiti?
text.2463: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m aruupakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha ruupaayatana.m  nuppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha dhammaayatana.m nuppajjissati. pa~ncavokaare  parinibbantaana.m aruupe pacchimabhavikaana.m tesa.m tattha ruupaayatana~nca  nuppajjati dhammaayatana~nca nuppajjissati.
text.2464: [03] (kha) yassa ^a^V1.0182^ea^ vaa pana yattha dhammaayatana.m ^a^T1.0161^ea^ nuppajjissati tassa  tattha ruupaayatana.m nuppajjatiiti?
text.2465: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m pa~ncavokaara.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  dhammaayatana.m nuppajjissati, no ca tesa.m tattha ruupaayatana.m nuppajjati.  pa~ncavokaare parinibbantaana.m aruupe pacchimabhavikaana.m tesa.m tattha  dhammaayatana~nca nuppajjissati ruupaayatana~nca nuppajjati.  (ruupaayatanamuulaka.m)
text.2466: [03] 103^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa yattha manaayatana.m nuppajjati tassa tattha  dhammaayatana.m nuppajjissatiiti?
text.2467: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m acittakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  manaayatana.m nuppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha dhammaayatana.m nuppajjissati.  parinibbantaana.m tesa.m tattha manaayatana~nca nuppajjati dhammaayatana~nca  nuppajjissati.
text.2468: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha dhammaayatana.m nuppajjissati tassa  tattha manaayatana.m nuppajjatiiti?
text.2469: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha dhammaayatana.m  nuppajjissati, no ca tesa.m tattha manaayatana.m nuppajjati.  parinibbantaana.m tesa.m tattha dhammaayatana~nca nuppajjissati manaayatana~nca  nuppajjati. (manaayatanamuulaka.m)
text.2472: [03] 104^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa cakkhaayatana.m uppajjittha tassa sotaayatana.m  uppajjissatiiti?
text.2473: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m ye ca aruupa.m upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti  tesa.m cakkhaayatana.m uppajjittha, no ca tesa.m sotaayatana.m uppajjissati.  itaresa.m ^a^V1.0183^ea^ ^a^M1.0124^ea^ tesa.m cakkhaayatana~nca uppajjittha sotaayatana~nca uppajjissati.
text.2474: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana sotaayatana.m uppajjissati tassa  cakkhaayatana.m uppajjitthaati ^a^T1.0162^ea^? aamantaa.
text.2475: [03] (ka) yassa cakkhaayatana.m uppajjittha tassa ghaanaayatana.m  uppajjissatiiti?

text.3002: [03] 178^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa ^a^V1.0231^ea^ manaayatana.m na nirujjhati tassa dhammaayatana.m  na nirujjhissatiiti? nirujjhissati.
text.3003: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana dhammaayatana.m na nirujjhissati tassa  manaayatana.m na nirujjhatiiti? nirujjhati.
text.3007: [03] 180^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa ^a^T1.0211^ea^ yattha cakkhaayatana.m na nirujjhati tassa  tattha sotaayatana.m na nirujjhissatiiti?
text.3008: [03] pa~ncavokaara.m upapajjantaana.m acakkhukaana.m kaamaavacaraa cavantaana.m  tesa.m tattha cakkhaayatana.m na nirujjhati, no ca tesa.m tattha sotaayatana.m  na nirujjhissati. asa~n~nasattaana.m aruupaana.m tesa.m tattha  cakkhaayatana~nca na nirujjhati sotaayatana~nca na nirujjhissati.
text.3009: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha sotaayatana.m na nirujjhissati  tassa tattha cakkhaayatana.m na nirujjhatiiti?
text.3010: [03] pa~ncavokaare parinibbantaana.m tesa.m tattha sotaayatana.m na  nirujjhissati, no ca tesa.m tattha cakkhaayatana.m na nirujjhati.  asa~n~nasattaana.m aruupaana.m tesa.m tattha sotaayatana~nca na nirujjhissati  cakkhaayatana~nca na nirujjhati.
text.3011: [03] (ka) yassa yattha cakkhaayatana.m na nirujjhati tassa tattha  ghaanaayatana.m na nirujjhissatiiti?
text.3012: [03] kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m acakkhukaana.m kaamaavacaraa cavantaana.m  tesa.m tattha cakkhaayatana.m na nirujjhati, no ca tesa.m tattha ghaanaayatana.m  na nirujjhissati. ruupaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m aruupaana.m  tesa.m tattha cakkhaayatana~nca na nirujjhati ghaanaayatana~nca na  nirujjhissati.
text.3013: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha ghaanaayatana.m na nirujjhissati  tassa tattha cakkhaayatana.m na nirujjhatiiti?
text.3014: [03] kaamaavacare parinibbantaana.m ruupaavacaraa cavantaana.m tesa.m tattha  ghaanaayatana.m na nirujjhissati, no ca tesa.m tattha cakkhaayatana.m na  nirujjhati ^a^V1.0232^ea^. ruupaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m aruupaana.m tesa.m  tattha ghaanaayatana~nca na nirujjhissati cakkhaayatana~nca na nirujjhati.
text.3015: [03] (ka) yassa yattha cakkhaayatana.m na nirujjhati tassa tattha  ruupaayatana.m na ^a^T1.0212^ea^ nirujjhissatiiti?
text.3016: [03] pa~ncavokaara.m upapajjantaana.m acakkhukaana.m kaamaavacaraa cavantaana.m  ^a^M1.0159^ea^ asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m tattha cakkhaayatana.m na nirujjhati, no ca tesa.m  tattha ruupaayatana.m na nirujjhissati. aruupaana.m tesa.m tattha  cakkhaayatana~nca na nirujjhati ruupaayatana~nca na nirujjhissati.
text.3017: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha ruupaayatana.m na nirujjhissati tassa  tattha cakkhaayatana.m na nirujjhatiiti?
text.3018: [03] pa~ncavokaare parinibbantaana.m tesa.m tattha ruupaayatana.m na  nirujjhissati, no ca tesa.m tattha cakkhaayatana.m na nirujjhati.  aruupaana.m tesa.m tattha ruupaayatana~nca na nirujjhissati cakkhaayatana~nca  na nirujjhati.
text.3019: [03] (ka) yassa yattha cakkhaayatana.m na nirujjhati tassa tattha  manaayatana.m na nirujjhissatiiti?
text.3020: [03] pa~ncavokaara.m upapajjantaana.m acakkhukaana.m kaamaavacaraa cavantaana.m  aruupaana.m tesa.m tattha cakkhaayatana.m na nirujjhati, no ca tesa.m tattha  manaayatana.m na nirujjhissati. aruupe parinibbantaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m  tesa.m tattha cakkhaayatana~nca na nirujjhati manaayatana~nca na  nirujjhissati.
text.3021: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha manaayatana.m na nirujjhissati tassa  tattha cakkhaayatana.m na nirujjhatiiti?
text.3022: [03] pa~ncavokaare parinibbantaana.m tesa.m tattha manaayatana.m na  nirujjhissati, no ca tesa.m tattha cakkhaayatana.m na nirujjhati.  aruupe parinibbantaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m tattha manaayatana~nca na  nirujjhissati cakkhaayatana~nca na nirujjhati.
text.3023: [03] (ka) yassa ^a^V1.0233^ea^ yattha cakkhaayatana.m na nirujjhati tassa tattha  dhammaayatana.m na nirujjhissatiiti?
text.3024: [03] sabbesa.m upapajjantaana.m acakkhukaana.m cavantaana.m tesa.m ^a^T1.0213^ea^ tattha  cakkhaayatana.m na nirujjhati, no ca tesa.m tattha dhammaayatana.m na  nirujjhissati. aruupe parinibbantaana.m tesa.m tattha cakkhaayatana~nca na  nirujjhati dhammaayatana~nca na nirujjhissati.
text.3025: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha dhammaayatana.m na nirujjhissati  tassa tattha cakkhaayatana.m na nirujjhatiiti?
text.3026: [03] pa~ncavokaare parinibbantaana.m tesa.m tattha dhammaayatana.m na  nirujjhissati, no ca tesa.m tattha cakkhaayatana.m na nirujjhati.  aruupe parinibbantaana.m tesa.m tattha dhammaayatana~nca na nirujjhissati  cakkhaayatana~nca na nirujjhati. (cakkhaayatanamuulaka.m)
text.3027: [03] 181^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa yattha ghaanaayatana.m na nirujjhati tassa  tattha ruupaayatana.m na nirujjhissatiiti?
text.3028: [03] kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m aghaanakaana.m kaamaavacaraa cavantaana.m  ruupaavacaraana.m tesa.m tattha ghaanaayatana.m na nirujjhati, no ca tesa.m tattha  ruupaayatana.m na nirujjhissati. ruupaavacare parinibbantaana.m aruupaana.m  tesa.m tattha ghaanaayatana~nca na nirujjhati ruupaayatana~nca na  nirujjhissati.
text.3029: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana ^a^M1.0160^ea^ yattha ruupaayatana.m na nirujjhissati tassa  tattha ghaanaayatana.m na nirujjhatiiti?
text.3030: [03] kaamaavacare parinibbantaana.m tesa.m tattha ruupaayatana.m na  nirujjhissati, no ca tesa.m tattha ghaanaayatana.m na nirujjhati.  ruupaavacare parinibbantaana.m aruupaana.m tesa.m tattha ruupaayatana~nca na  nirujjhissati ghaanaayatana~nca na nirujjhati.
text.3031: [03] (ka) yassa yattha ghaanaayatana.m na nirujjhati tassa tattha  manaayatana.m na nirujjhissatiiti?
text.3032: [03] kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m aghaanakaana.m kaamaavacaraa cavantaana.m  ruupaavacaraana.m ^a^V1.0234^ea^ aruupaavacaraana.m tesa.m tattha ghaanaayatana.m na nirujjhati, no   ^a^T1.0214^ea^ ca tesa.m tattha manaayatana.m na nirujjhissati. ruupaavacare aruupaavacare  parinibbantaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m tattha ghaanaayatana~nca na nirujjhati  manaayatana~nca na nirujjhissati.

text.3034: [03] kaamaavacare parinibbantaana.m tesa.m tattha manaayatana.m na  nirujjhissati, no ca tesa.m tattha ghaanaayatana.m na nirujjhati.  ruupaavacare aruupaavacare parinibbantaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m tattha  manaayatana~nca na nirujjhissati ghaanaayatana~nca na nirujjhati.

text.3052: [03] pa~ncavokaare parinibbantaana.m aruupe pacchimabhavikaana.m ye ca  aruupa.m upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti tesa.m cavantaana.m tesa.m  cakkhaayatana.m nirujjhittha, no ca tesa.m sotaayatana.m nirujjhissati.  itaresa.m tesa.m cakkhaayatana~nca nirujjhittha sotaayatana~nca  nirujjhissati.
text.3053: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana sotaayatana.m nirujjhissati tassa  cakkhaayatana.m nirujjhitthaati? aamantaa.
text.3054: [03] (ka) yassa cakkhaayatana.m nirujjhittha tassa ghaanaayatana.m  nirujjhissatiiti?
text.3055: [03] kaamaavacare parinibbantaana.m ruupaavacare aruupaavacare  pacchimabhavikaana.m ye ca ruupaavacara.m aruupaavacara.m upapajjitvaa  parinibbaayissanti tesa.m cavantaana.m tesa.m cakkhaayatana.m nirujjhittha, no  ca tesa.m ghaanaayatana.m nirujjhissati. itaresa.m ^a^M1.0162^ea^ tesa.m cakkhaayatana~nca  nirujjhittha ghaanaayatana~nca nirujjhissati.
text.3057: [03] (ka) yassa cakkhaayatana.m nirujjhittha tassa ruupaayatana.m  nirujjhissatiiti?

text.3060: [03] yassa cakkhaayatana.m nirujjhittha tassa manaayatana.m...pe0...  dhammaayatana.m nirujjhissatiiti?
text.3061: [03] parinibbantaana.m tesa.m cakkhaayatana.m nirujjhittha, no ^a^T1.0217^ea^ ca tesa.m  dhammaayatana.m nirujjhissati ^a^V1.0237^ea^. itaresa.m tesa.m cakkhaayatana~nca  nirujjhittha dhammaayatana~nca nirujjhissati. yassa vaa pana...pe0...?  aamantaa. (cakkhaayatanamuulaka.m)

text.3099: [03] ruupaavacaraana.m tesa.m tattha ruupaayatana.m nirujjhissati, no ca tesa.m  tattha ghaanaayatana.m nirujjhittha. kaamaavacaraana.m tesa.m tattha  ruupaayatana~nca nirujjhissati ghaanaayatana~nca nirujjhittha.

text.3105: [03] pa~ncavokaare parinibbantaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m tattha ruupaayatana.m  nirujjhittha ^a^V1.0241^ea^, no ca tesa.m tattha manaayatana.m nirujjhissati. itaresa.m  pa~ncavokaaraana.m tesa.m tattha ruupaayatana~nca nirujjhittha manaayatana~nca  nirujjhissati.

text.3125: [03] suddhaavaasa.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha cakkhaayatana.m na nirujjhittha,  no ca tesa.m tattha sotaayatana.m na nirujjhissati. suddhaavaase  parinibbantaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m aruupaana.m tesa.m tattha cakkhaayatana~nca na  nirujjhittha sotaayatana~nca na nirujjhissati.

text.3127: [03] pa~ncavokaare parinibbantaana.m tesa.m tattha sotaayatana.m na  nirujjhissati ^a^V1.0243^ea^, no ca tesa.m tattha cakkhaayatana.m na nirujjhittha.  suddhaavaase parinibbantaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m aruupaana.m tesa.m tattha  sotaayatana~nca na nirujjhissati cakkhaayatana~nca na nirujjhittha.

text.3299: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha dhammaayatana.m nirujjhissati tassa  tattha manaayatana.m uppajjissatiiti?
text.3300: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m upapajjantaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m tattha  dhammaayatana.m nirujjhissati, no ca tesa.m tattha manaayatana.m  uppajjissati. itaresa.m catuvokaaraana.m pa~ncavokaaraana.m tesa.m tattha  dhammaayatana~nca nirujjhissati manaayatana~nca uppajjissati.
text.3302: [03] 220^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjissati tassa  sotaayatana.m na nirujjhissatiiti?
text.3303: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m pa~ncavokaara.m upapajjantaana.m ye ca aruupa.m  upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti tesa.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m cakkhaayatana.m  nuppajjissati, no ca tesa.m sotaayatana.m na nirujjhissati.  pa~ncavokaare parinibbantaana.m aruupe pacchimabhavikaana.m ye ca aruupa.m  upapajjitvaa ^a^V1.0260^ea^ parinibbaayissanti tesa.m cavantaana.m tesa.m cakkhaayatana~nca  nuppajjissati sotaayatana~nca na nirujjhissati.
text.3304: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana sotaayatana.m na nirujjhissati tassa  cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjissatiiti? aamantaa.
text.3305: [03] (ka) yassa cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjissati tassa ghaanaayatana.m na  nirujjhissatiiti?
text.3306: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m ye ca aruupa.m  upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti tesa.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m cakkhaayatana.m  nuppajjissati ^a^T1.0241^ea^, no ca tesa.m ghaanaayatana.m na nirujjhissati.  kaamaavacare parinibbantaana.m ruupaavacare aruupaavacare pacchimabhavikaana.m ye  ca aruupa.m upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti tesa.m cavantaana.m tesa.m  cakkhaayatana~nca nuppajjissati ghaanaayatana~nca na nirujjhissati.
text.3307: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana ghaanaayatana.m na nirujjhissati tassa  cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjissatiiti?
text.3308: [03] ye ruupaavacara.m upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti tesa.m cavantaana.m  tesa.m ghaanaayatana.m na nirujjhissati, no ca tesa.m cakkhaayatana.m  nuppajjissati. kaamaavacare parinibbantaana.m ruupaavacare aruupaavacare  pacchimabhavikaana.m ye ca aruupa.m upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti  ^a^M1.0179^ea^ tesa.m cavantaana.m tesa.m ghaanaayatana~nca na nirujjhissati cakkhaayatana~nca  nuppajjissati.
text.3309: [03] (ka) yassa cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjissati tassa ruupaayatana.m na  nirujjhissatiiti?
text.3310: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m pa~ncavokaara.m upapajjantaana.m ye ca aruupa.m  upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti tesa.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m cakkhaayatana.m  nuppajjissati, no ca tesa.m ruupaayatana.m na nirujjhissati.  pa~ncavokaare parinibbantaana.m aruupe pacchimabhavikaana.m ye ca aruupa.m  upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti tesa.m cavantaana.m tesa.m cakkhaayatana~nca  nuppajjissati ruupaayatana~nca na nirujjhissati.
text.3311: [03] (kha) yassa ^a^V1.0261^ea^ vaa pana ruupaayatana.m na nirujjhissati tassa  cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjissatiiti? aamantaa.
text.3312: [03] yassa cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjissati tassa manaayatana.m...pe0...  dhammaayatana.m na nirujjhissatiiti?
text.3313: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m upapajjantaana.m ye ca aruupa.m ^a^T1.0242^ea^ upapajjitvaa  parinibbaayissanti tesa.m cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjissati, no ca tesa.m  dhammaayatana.m na nirujjhissati. parinibbantaana.m tesa.m cakkhaayatana~nca  nuppajjissati dhammaayatana~nca na nirujjhissati.
text.3315: [03] 221^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa ghaanaayatana.m nuppajjissati tassa ruupaayatana.m  na nirujjhissatiiti?
text.3316: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m pa~ncavokaara.m upapajjantaana.m ye ca ruupaavacara.m  aruupaavacara.m upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti tesa.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m  ghaanaayatana.m nuppajjissati, no ca tesa.m ruupaayatana.m na nirujjhissati.  pa~ncavokaare parinibbantaana.m aruupe pacchimabhavikaana.m ye ca aruupa.m  upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti tesa.m cavantaana.m tesa.m ghaanaayatana~nca  nuppajjissati ruupaayatana~nca na nirujjhissati.
text.3318: [03] yassa ghaanaayatana.m nuppajjissati tassa manaayatana.m...pe0...  dhammaayatana.m na nirujjhissatiiti?
text.3319: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m upapajjantaana.m ye ca ruupaavacara.m aruupaavacara.m  upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti tesa.m ghaanaayatana.m nuppajjissati, no  ca tesa.m dhammaayatana.m na nirujjhissati. parinibbantaana.m tesa.m  ghaanaayatana~nca nuppajjissati dhammaayatana~nca na nirujjhissati.
text.3321: [03] 222^b^.^eb^ yassa ^a^M1.0180^ea^ ruupaayatana.m nuppajjissati tassa  manaayatana.m...pe0... dhammaayatana.m na nirujjhissatiiti?
text.3322: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m ^a^V1.0262^ea^ upapajjantaana.m ye ca aruupa.m ^a^T1.0243^ea^ upapajjitvaa  parinibbaayissanti tesa.m ruupaayatana.m nuppajjissati, no ca tesa.m  dhammaayatana.m na nirujjhissati. parinibbantaana.m tesa.m ruupaayatana~nca  nuppajjissati dhammaayatana~nca na nirujjhissati.
text.3324: [03] 223^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa manaayatana.m nuppajjissati tassa dhammaayatana.m  na nirujjhissatiiti?
text.3325: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m manaayatana.m nuppajjissati,  no ca tesa.m dhammaayatana.m na nirujjhissati. parinibbantaana.m tesa.m  manaayatana~nca nuppajjissati dhammaayatana~nca na nirujjhissati.
text.3326: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana dhammaayatana.m na nirujjhissati tassa  manaayatana.m nuppajjissatiiti? aamantaa.
text.3330: [03] 225^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa yattha cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjissati tassa  tattha sotaayatana.m na nirujjhissatiiti?
text.3331: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m pa~ncavokaara.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjissati, no ca tesa.m tattha sotaayatana.m na  nirujjhissati. pa~ncavokaare parinibbantaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m aruupaana.m  tesa.m tattha cakkhaayatana~nca nuppajjissati sotaayatana~nca na  nirujjhissati.
text.3333: [03] (ka) yassa yattha cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjissati tassa tattha  ghaanaayatana.m na nirujjhissatiiti?
text.3334: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjissati, no ca tesa.m tattha ghaanaayatana.m na ^a^T1.0244^ea^  nirujjhissati. kaamaavacare parinibbantaana.m ruupaavacare  pacchimabhavikaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m ^a^V1.0263^ea^ aruupaana.m tesa.m tattha cakkhaayatana~nca  nuppajjissati ghaanaayatana~nca na nirujjhissati.
text.3335: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha ghaanaayatana.m na nirujjhissati  tassa tattha cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjissatiiti?
text.3336: [03] ruupaavacaraana.m tesa.m tattha ghaanaayatana.m na nirujjhissati, no ca  tesa.m tattha cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjissati. kaamaavacare parinibbantaana.m  ruupaavacare pacchimabhavikaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m aruupaana.m tesa.m tattha  ghaanaayatana~nca na nirujjhissati cakkhaayatana~nca nuppajjissati.
text.3337: [03] (ka) yassa ^a^M1.0181^ea^ yattha cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjissati tassa tattha  ruupaayatana.m na nirujjhissatiiti?
text.3338: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m pa~ncavokaara.m upapajjantaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m  tattha cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjissati, no ca tesa.m tattha ruupaayatana.m na  nirujjhissati. pa~ncavokaare parinibbantaana.m aruupaana.m tesa.m tattha  cakkhaayatana~nca nuppajjissati ruupaayatana~nca na nirujjhissati.
text.3340: [03] (ka) yassa yattha cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjissati tassa tattha  manaayatana.m na nirujjhissatiiti?
text.3341: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m pa~ncavokaara.m upapajjantaana.m aruupaana.m tesa.m tattha  cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjissati, no ca tesa.m tattha manaayatana.m na  nirujjhissati. parinibbantaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m tattha  cakkhaayatana~nca nuppajjissati manaayatana~nca na nirujjhissati.
text.3343: [03] (ka) yassa ^a^T1.0245^ea^ yattha cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjissati tassa tattha  dhammaayatana.m na nirujjhissatiiti?
text.3344: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m pa~ncavokaara.m upapajjantaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m  aruupaana.m tesa.m tattha cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjissati, no ca tesa.m tattha  dhammaayatana.m ^a^V1.0264^ea^ na nirujjhissati. parinibbantaana.m tesa.m tattha  cakkhaayatana~nca nuppajjissati dhammaayatana~nca na nirujjhissati.
text.3346: [03] 226^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa yattha ghaanaayatana.m nuppajjissati tassa tattha  ruupaayatana.m na nirujjhissatiiti?
text.3347: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m ruupaavacaraana.m tesa.m  tattha ghaanaayatana.m nuppajjissati, no ca tesa.m tattha ruupaayatana.m na  nirujjhissati. pa~ncavokaare parinibbantaana.m aruupaana.m tesa.m tattha  ghaanaayatana~nca nuppajjissati ruupaayatana~nca na nirujjhissati.
text.3349: [03] (ka) yassa yattha ghaanaayatana.m nuppajjissati tassa tattha  manaayatana.m na nirujjhissatiiti?
text.3350: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m ruupaavacaraana.m  aruupaavacaraana.m tesa.m tattha ghaanaayatana.m nuppajjissati, no ca tesa.m tattha  manaayatana.m na nirujjhissati. parinibbantaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m  tattha ghaanaayatana~nca nuppajjissati manaayatana~nca na nirujjhissati.
text.3352: [03] (ka) yassa ^a^M1.0182^ea^ yattha ghaanaayatana.m nuppajjissati tassa tattha  dhammaayatana.m na nirujjhissatiiti?
text.3353: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m ruupaavacaraana.m ^a^T1.0246^ea^  aruupaavacaraana.m tesa.m tattha ghaanaayatana.m nuppajjissati, no ca tesa.m tattha  dhammaayatana.m na nirujjhissati. parinibbantaana.m tesa.m tattha  ghaanaayatana~nca nuppajjissati dhammaayatana~nca na nirujjhissati.
text.3355: [03] 227^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa ^a^V1.0265^ea^ yattha ruupaayatana.m nuppajjissati tassa tattha  manaayatana.m na nirujjhissatiiti?
text.3356: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m pa~ncavokaara.m upapajjantaana.m aruupaana.m tesa.m tattha  ruupaayatana.m nuppajjissati, no ca tesa.m tattha manaayatana.m na  nirujjhissati. parinibbantaana.m tesa.m tattha ruupaayatana~nca  nuppajjissati manaayatana~nca na nirujjhissati.
text.3357: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha manaayatana.m na nirujjhissati tassa  tattha ruupaayatana.m nuppajjissatiiti?
text.3358: [03] asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m tattha manaayatana.m na nirujjhissati, no ca  tesa.m tattha ruupaayatana.m nuppajjissati. parinibbantaana.m tesa.m tattha  manaayatana~nca na nirujjhissati ruupaayatana~nca nuppajjissati.
text.3359: [03] (ka) yassa yattha ruupaayatana.m nuppajjissati tassa tattha  dhammaayatana.m na nirujjhissatiiti?
text.3360: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m pa~ncavokaara.m upapajjantaana.m aruupaana.m tesa.m tattha  ruupaayatana.m nuppajjissati, no ca tesa.m tattha dhammaayatana.m na  nirujjhissati. parinibbantaana.m tesa.m tattha ruupaayatana~nca  nuppajjissati dhammaayatana~nca na nirujjhissati.
text.3362: [03] 228^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa yattha manaayatana.m nuppajjissati tassa tattha  dhammaayatana.m ^a^T1.0247^ea^ na nirujjhissatiiti?
text.3363: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m upapajjantaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m tattha  manaayatana.m nuppajjissati, no ca tesa.m tattha dhammaayatana.m na  nirujjhissati. parinibbantaana.m tesa.m tattha manaayatana~nca  nuppajjissati dhammaayatana~nca na nirujjhissati.
text.3364: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha dhammaayatana.m na nirujjhissati  tassa tattha manaayatana.m nuppajjissatiiti? aamantaa.
text.3367: [03] 229^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa ^a^V1.0266^ea^ cakkhaayatana.m uppajjati tassa sotaayatana.m  nirujjhitthaati? aamantaa.
text.3368: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana sotaayatana.m nirujjhittha tassa  cakkhaayatana.m uppajjatiiti ^a^M1.0183^ea^?
text.3369: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m acakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m sotaayatana.m  nirujjhittha, no ca tesa.m cakkhaayatana.m uppajjati. sacakkhukaana.m  upapajjantaana.m tesa.m sotaayatana~nca nirujjhittha cakkhaayatana~nca  uppajjati.
text.3370: [03] (yathaa uppaadavaare paccuppannaatiitaa pucchaa vibhattaa eva.m  uppaadanirodhepi paccuppannaatiitaa pucchaa anulomampi paccaniikampi  vibhajitabbaa {vibhajitabba.m (sii syaa0 ka0)} ).
text.3373: [03] 230^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa cakkhaayatana.m uppajjati tassa sotaayatana.m  nirujjhissatiiti? aamantaa.
text.3374: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana sotaayatana.m nirujjhissati tassa  cakkhaayatana.m uppajjatiiti?
text.3375: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m acakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m sotaayatana.m  nirujjhissati, no ca tesa.m cakkhaayatana.m uppajjati. sacakkhukaana.m  upapajjantaana.m ^a^V1.0267^ea^ tesa.m sotaayatana~nca nirujjhissati ^a^T1.0248^ea^ cakkhaayatana~nca  uppajjati.
text.3376: [03] (ka) yassa cakkhaayatana.m uppajjati tassa ghaanaayatana.m  nirujjhissatiiti?
text.3377: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m ruupaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m cakkhaayatana.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m ghaanaayatana.m nirujjhissati. itaresa.m  sacakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m cakkhaayatana~nca uppajjati  ghaanaayatana~nca nirujjhissati.

text.3379: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m acakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m ghaanaayatana.m  nirujjhissati, no ca tesa.m cakkhaayatana.m uppajjati. sacakkhukaana.m  upapajjantaana.m tesa.m ghaanaayatana~nca nirujjhissati cakkhaayatana~nca  uppajjati.

text.3387: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana dhammaayatana.m nirujjhissati tassa  cakkhaayatana.m uppajjatiiti?
text.3388: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m acakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m...pe0...  sacakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m dhammaayatana~nca nirujjhissati  cakkhaayatana~nca uppajjati.
text.3389: [03] 231^b^.^eb^ yassa ghaanaayatana.m uppajjati tassa ruupaayatana.m...pe0...  manaayatana.m... dhammaayatana.m nirujjhissatiiti? aamantaa.

text.3391: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m aghaanakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m dhammaayatana.m  nirujjhissati, no ca tesa.m ghaanaayatana.m uppajjati. saghaanakaana.m  upapajjantaana.m tesa.m dhammaayatana~nca nirujjhissati ghaanaayatana~nca  uppajjati.

text.3395: [03] 233^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa ^a^T1.0250^ea^ manaayatana.m uppajjati tassa dhammaayatana.m  nirujjhissatiiti? aamantaa.
text.3397: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m acittakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m dhammaayatana.m  nirujjhissati, no ca tesa.m manaayatana.m uppajjati. sacittakaana.m  upapajjantaana.m tesa.m dhammaayatana~nca nirujjhissati manaayatana~nca  uppajjati.
text.3401: [03] 235^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa yattha cakkhaayatana.m uppajjati tassa tattha  sotaayatana.m nirujjhissatiiti? aamantaa.
text.3402: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha sotaayatana.m nirujjhissati tassa  ^a^M1.0185^ea^ tattha cakkhaayatana.m uppajjatiiti?
text.3403: [03] pa~ncavokaaraa cavantaana.m acakkhukaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m  tesa.m tattha sotaayatana.m nirujjhissati, no ca tesa.m tattha cakkhaayatana.m  uppajjati. sacakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha sotaayatana~nca  nirujjhissati cakkhaayatana~nca uppajjati.
text.3404: [03] (ka) yassa yattha cakkhaayatana.m uppajjati tassa tattha  ghaanaayatana.m nirujjhissatiiti?
text.3405: [03] ruupaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha cakkhaayatana.m uppajjati, no  ca tesa.m tattha ghaanaayatana.m nirujjhissati. sacakkhukaana.m kaamaavacara.m  upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha cakkhaayatana~nca uppajjati ghaanaayatana~nca  nirujjhissati.
text.3406: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha ghaanaayatana.m nirujjhissati tassa  tattha cakkhaayatana.m uppajjatiiti?
text.3407: [03] kaamaavacaraa cavantaana.m ^a^T1.0251^ea^ acakkhukaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m  tesa.m tattha ghaanaayatana.m nirujjhissati, no ca tesa.m tattha cakkhaayatana.m  uppajjati. sacakkhukaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  ghaanaayatana~nca nirujjhissati cakkhaayatana~nca uppajjati.
text.3408: [03] (ka) yassa yattha cakkhaayatana.m uppajjati tassa tattha  ruupaayatana.m nirujjhissatiiti? aamantaa.
text.3409: [03] (kha) yassa ^a^V1.0270^ea^ vaa pana yattha ruupaayatana.m nirujjhissati tassa  tattha cakkhaayatana.m uppajjatiiti?
text.3410: [03] pa~ncavokaaraa cavantaana.m acakkhukaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m  asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m tattha ruupaayatana.m nirujjhissati, no ca tesa.m tattha  cakkhaayatana.m uppajjati. sacakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  ruupaayatana~nca nirujjhissati cakkhaayatana~nca uppajjati.
text.3411: [03] (ka) yassa yattha cakkhaayatana.m uppajjati tassa tattha  manaayatana.m nirujjhissatiiti? aamantaa.
text.3412: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha manaayatana.m nirujjhissati tassa  tattha cakkhaayatana.m uppajjatiiti?
text.3413: [03] pa~ncavokaaraa cavantaana.m acakkhukaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m  aruupaana.m tesa.m tattha manaayatana.m nirujjhissati, no ca tesa.m tattha  cakkhaayatana.m uppajjati. sacakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  manaayatana~nca nirujjhissati cakkhaayatana~nca uppajjati.
text.3414: [03] (ka) yassa yattha cakkhaayatana.m uppajjati tassa tattha  dhammaayatana.m nirujjhissatiiti? aamantaa.
text.3415: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha dhammaayatana.m nirujjhissati ^a^T1.0252^ea^ tassa  tattha cakkhaayatana.m uppajjatiiti?
text.3416: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m acakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  dhammaayatana.m nirujjhissati, no ca tesa.m tattha cakkhaayatana.m ^a^M1.0186^ea^ uppajjati.  sacakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha dhammaayatana~nca nirujjhissati  cakkhaayatana~nca uppajjati. (cakkhaayatanamuulaka.m)
text.3417: [03] 236^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa yattha ghaanaayatana.m uppajjati tassa tattha  ruupaayatana.m nirujjhissatiiti? aamantaa.
text.3418: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha ruupaayatana.m nirujjhissati tassa  tattha ghaanaayatana.m uppajjatiiti?
text.3419: [03] kaamaavacaraa ^a^V1.0271^ea^ cavantaana.m aghaanakaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m  ruupaavacaraana.m tesa.m tattha ruupaayatana.m nirujjhissati, no ca tesa.m tattha  ghaanaayatana.m uppajjati. saghaanakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  ruupaayatana~nca nirujjhissati ghaanaayatana~nca uppajjati.
text.3420: [03] (ka) yassa yattha ghaanaayatana.m uppajjati tassa tattha manaayatana.m  nirujjhissatiiti? aamantaa.
text.3422: [03] kaamaavacaraa cavantaana.m aghaanakaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m  ruupaavacaraana.m aruupaavacaraana.m tesa.m tattha manaayatana.m...pe0... saghaanakaana.m  upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha manaayatana~nca nirujjhissati ghaanaayatana~nca  uppajjati.
text.3423: [03] (ka) yassa yattha ghaanaayatana.m uppajjati tassa tattha dhammaayatana.m  nirujjhissatiiti? aamantaa.
text.3425: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m aghaanakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha dhammaayatana.m...pe0...  saghaanakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha dhammaayatana~nca nirujjhissati  ghaanaayatana~nca uppajjati. (ghaanaayatanamuulaka.m)
text.3426: [03] 237^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa yattha ruupaayatana.m uppajjati tassa tattha  manaayatana.m nirujjhissatiiti?
text.3427: [03] asa~n~nasatta.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha ruupaayatana.m uppajjati, no  ca tesa.m tattha...pe0... pa~ncavokaara.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha...pe0....
text.3429: [03] pa~ncavokaaraa cavantaana.m aruupaana.m tesa.m tattha...pe0...  pa~ncavokaara.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha manaayatana~nca nirujjhissati  ruupaayatana~nca uppajjati.
text.3430: [03] (ka) yassa yattha ruupaayatana.m uppajjati tassa tattha dhammaayatana.m  nirujjhissatiiti? aamantaa.
text.3432: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m aruupakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  dhammaayatana.m nirujjhissati, no ca tesa.m tattha ruupaayatana.m uppajjati.  saruupakaana.m upapajjantaana.m ^a^V1.0272^ea^ tesa.m tattha dhammaayatana~nca nirujjhissati  ruupaayatana~nca uppajjati.
text.3433: [03] 238^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa ^a^M1.0187^ea^ yattha manaayatana.m uppajjati tassa tattha  dhammaayatana.m nirujjhissatiiti ^a^T1.0254^ea^? aamantaa.
text.3434: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha dhammaayatana.m nirujjhissati tassa  tattha manaayatana.m uppajjatiiti?
text.3435: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m acittakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  dhammaayatana.m nirujjhissati, no ca tesa.m tattha manaayatana.m uppajjati.  sacittakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha dhammaayatana~nca nirujjhissati  manaayatana~nca uppajjati.
text.3437: [03] 239^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjati tassa sotaayatana.m  na nirujjhissatiiti?
text.3438: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m acakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m cakkhaayatana.m  nuppajjati, no ca tesa.m sotaayatana.m na nirujjhissati. pa~ncavokaare  parinibbantaana.m aruupe pacchimabhavikaana.m ye ca aruupa.m upapajjitvaa  parinibbaayissanti tesa.m cavantaana.m tesa.m cakkhaayatana~nca nuppajjati  sotaayatana~nca na nirujjhissati.
text.3439: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana sotaayatana.m na nirujjhissati tassa  cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjatiiti? aamantaa.
text.3440: [03] (ka) yassa cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjati tassa ghaanaayatana.m na  nirujjhissatiiti?
text.3441: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m acakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m cakkhaayatana.m  nuppajjati, no ca tesa.m ghaanaayatana.m na nirujjhissati. pa~ncavokaare  parinibbantaana.m aruupe pacchimabhavikaana.m ye ca ruupaavacara.m aruupaavacara.m  upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti tesa.m cavantaana.m tesa.m cakkhaayatana~nca  nuppajjati ghaanaayatana~nca na nirujjhissati.
text.3442: [03] (kha) yassa ^a^V1.0273^ea^ vaa pana ghaanaayatana.m na nirujjhissati tassa  cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjatiiti?
text.3443: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m ruupaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m ghaanaayatana.m na  nirujjhissati, no ^a^T1.0255^ea^ ca tesa.m cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjati. pa~ncavokaare  parinibbantaana.m aruupe pacchimabhavikaana.m ye ca ruupaavacara.m aruupaavacara.m  upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti tesa.m cavantaana.m tesa.m ghaanaayatana~nca na  nirujjhissati cakkhaayatana~nca nuppajjati.
text.3444: [03] (ka) yassa cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjati tassa ruupaayatana.m na  nirujjhissatiiti?
text.3445: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m acakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m cakkhaayatana.m  nuppajjati, no ca tesa.m ruupaayatana.m na nirujjhissati. pa~ncavokaare  parinibbantaana.m aruupe pacchimabhavikaana.m ye ca aruupa.m upapajjitvaa  parinibbaayissanti tesa.m cavantaana.m ^a^M1.0188^ea^ tesa.m cakkhaayatana~nca nuppajjati  ruupaayatana~nca na nirujjhissati.
text.3447: [03] yassa cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjati tassa manaayatana.m...pe0...  dhammaayatana.m na nirujjhissatiiti?
text.3448: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m acakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m cakkhaayatana.m  nuppajjati, no ca tesa.m dhammaayatana.m na nirujjhissati.  parinibbantaana.m tesa.m cakkhaayatana~nca nuppajjati dhammaayatana~nca na  nirujjhissati.
text.3450: [03] 240^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa ghaanaayatana.m nuppajjati tassa ruupaayatana.m na  nirujjhissatiiti?
text.3451: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m aghaanakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m ghaanaayatana.m  nuppajjati, no ca tesa.m ruupaayatana.m na nirujjhissati. pa~ncavokaare  parinibbantaana.m aruupe pacchimabhavikaana.m ye ca aruupa.m upapajjitvaa  parinibbaayissanti tesa.m cavantaana.m tesa.m ghaanaayatana~nca nuppajjati  ruupaayatana~nca ^a^T1.0256^ea^ na nirujjhissati.
text.3453: [03] yassa ^a^V1.0274^ea^ ghaanaayatana.m nuppajjati tassa manaayatana.m...pe0...  dhammaayatana.m na nirujjhissatiiti?
text.3454: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m aghaanakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m ghaanaayatana.m  nuppajjati, no ca tesa.m dhammaayatana.m na nirujjhissati.  parinibbantaana.m tesa.m ghaanaayatana~nca nuppajjati dhammaayatana~nca na  nirujjhissati.
text.3456: [03] 241^b^.^eb^ yassa ruupaayatana.m nuppajjati tassa manaayatana.m...pe0...  dhammaayatana.m na nirujjhissatiiti?
text.3457: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m aruupakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m ruupaayatana.m  nuppajjati, no ca tesa.m dhammaayatana.m na nirujjhissati.  parinibbantaana.m tesa.m ruupaayatana~nca nuppajjati dhammaayatana~nca na  nirujjhissati.
text.3459: [03] 242^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa manaayatana.m nuppajjati tassa dhammaayatana.m na  nirujjhissatiiti?
text.3460: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m acittakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m manaayatana.m  nuppajjati, no ca tesa.m dhammaayatana.m na nirujjhissati.  parinibbantaana.m tesa.m manaayatana~nca nuppajjati dhammaayatana~nca na  nirujjhissati.
text.3461: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana dhammaayatana.m na nirujjhissati tassa  manaayatana.m nuppajjatiiti? aamantaa.
text.3465: [03] 244^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa yattha cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjati tassa tattha  sotaayatana.m na nirujjhissatiiti?
text.3466: [03] pa~ncavokaaraa ^a^V1.0275^ea^ cavantaana.m acakkhukaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m  tesa.m tattha cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha sotaayatana.m ^a^T1.0257^ea^ na  nirujjhissati. pa~ncavokaare parinibbantaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m aruupaana.m  tesa.m tattha cakkhaayatana~nca nuppajjati sotaayatana~nca na nirujjhissati.
text.3467: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha sotaayatana.m na nirujjhissati  tassa tattha cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjatiiti? aamantaa.
text.3468: [03] (ka) yassa yattha cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjati tassa tattha  ghaanaayatana.m na nirujjhissatiiti?
text.3469: [03] kaamaavacaraa cavantaana.m acakkhukaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m  tesa.m tattha cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha ghaanaayatana.m na  nirujjhissati. kaamaavacare parinibbantaana.m ruupaavacaraa cavantaana.m  asa~n~nasattaana.m aruupaana.m tesa.m tattha cakkhaayatana~nca nuppajjati  ghaanaayatana~nca na nirujjhissati.
text.3470: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha ghaanaayatana.m na nirujjhissati  tassa tattha cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjatiiti?
text.3471: [03] ruupaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha ghaanaayatana.m na  nirujjhissati, no ca tesa.m tattha cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjati.  kaamaavacare parinibbantaana.m ruupaavacaraa cavantaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m  aruupaana.m tesa.m tattha ghaanaayatana~nca na nirujjhissati cakkhaayatana~nca  nuppajjati.
text.3472: [03] (ka) yassa yattha cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjati tassa tattha  ruupaayatana.m na nirujjhissatiiti?
text.3473: [03] pa~ncavokaaraa cavantaana.m acakkhukaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m  asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m tattha cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha  ruupaayatana.m na nirujjhissati. pa~ncavokaare parinibbantaana.m aruupaana.m  tesa.m tattha cakkhaayatana~nca nuppajjati ruupaayatana~nca na ^a^T1.0258^ea^ nirujjhissati.
text.3474: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha ruupaayatana.m na nirujjhissati tassa  tattha cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjatiiti? aamantaa.
text.3475: [03] (ka) yassa ^a^V1.0276^ea^ yattha cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjati tassa tattha  manaayatana.m na nirujjhissatiiti?
text.3476: [03] pa~ncavokaaraa cavantaana.m acakkhukaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m  aruupaana.m ^a^M1.0190^ea^ tasa.m tattha cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha  manaayatana.m na nirujjhissati. parinibbantaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m  tattha cakkhaayatana~nca nuppajjati manaayatana~nca na nirujjhissati.
text.3477: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha manaayatana.m na nirujjhissati tassa  tattha cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjatiiti? aamantaa.
text.3478: [03] (ka) yassa yattha cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjati tassa tattha  dhammaayatana.m na nirujjhissatiiti?
text.3479: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m acakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha dhammaayatana.m na  nirujjhissati. parinibbantaana.m tesa.m tattha cakkhaayatana~nca nuppajjati  dhammaayatana~nca na nirujjhissati.
text.3480: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha dhammaayatana.m na nirujjhissati  tassa tattha cakkhaayatana.m nuppajjatiiti? aamantaa.  (cakkhaayatanamuulaka.m)
text.3481: [03] 245^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa yattha ghaanaayatana.m nuppajjati tassa tattha  ruupaayatana.m na nirujjhissatiiti?
text.3482: [03] kaamaavacaraa cavantaana.m aghaanakaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m  ruupaavacaraana.m tesa.m tattha ghaanaayatana.m nuppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha  ruupaayatana.m na nirujjhissati. pa~ncavokaare parinibbantaana.m aruupaana.m  tesa.m tattha ghaanaayatana~nca nuppajjati ruupaayatana~nca na nirujjhissati ^a^T1.0259^ea^.
text.3483: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha ruupaayatana.m na nirujjhissati tassa  tattha ghaanaayatana.m nuppajjatiiti? aamantaa.
text.3484: [03] (ka) yassa yattha ghaanaayatana.m nuppajjati tassa tattha manaayatana.m  na nirujjhissatiiti?
text.3485: [03] kaamaavacaraa cavantaana.m aghaanakaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m  ruupaavacaraana.m ^a^V1.0277^ea^ aruupaavacaraana.m tesa.m tattha ghaanaayatana.m nuppajjati, no ca  tesa.m tattha manaayatana.m na nirujjhissati. parinibbantaana.m  asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m tattha ghaanaayatana~nca nuppajjati manaayatana~nca na  nirujjhissati.
text.3486: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha manaayatana.m na nirujjhissati tassa  tattha ghaanaayatana.m nuppajjatiiti? aamantaa.
text.3487: [03] (ka) yassa yattha ghaanaayatana.m nuppajjati tassa tattha  dhammaayatana.m na nirujjhissatiiti?
text.3488: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m aghaanakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  ghaanaayatana.m nuppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha dhammaayatana.m na  nirujjhissati. parinibbantaana.m tesa.m tattha ghaanaayatana~nca nuppajjati  dhammaayatana~nca na nirujjhissati.
text.3489: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha dhammaayatana.m na nirujjhissati  tassa tattha ghaanaayatana.m nuppajjatiiti? aamantaa.  (ghaanaayatanamuulaka.m)
text.3490: [03] 246^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa ^a^M1.0191^ea^ yattha ruupaayatana.m nuppajjati tassa tattha  manaayatana.m na nirujjhissatiiti?
text.3491: [03] pa~ncavokaaraa cavantaana.m aruupaana.m tesa.m tattha ruupaayatana.m  nuppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha manaayatana.m na nirujjhissati.  parinibbantaana.m asa~n~nasattaa cavantaana.m tesa.m tattha ruupaayatana~nca  nuppajjati manaayatana~nca na nirujjhissati.
text.3492: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha manaayatana.m ^a^T1.0260^ea^ na nirujjhissati tassa  tattha ruupaayatana.m nuppajjatiiti?
text.3493: [03] asa~n~nasatta.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha manaayatana.m na  nirujjhissati, no ca tesa.m tattha ruupaayatana.m nuppajjati.  parinibbantaana.m asa~n~nasattaa cavantaana.m tesa.m tattha manaayatana~nca na  nirujjhissati ruupaayatana~nca nuppajjati.
text.3494: [03] (ka) yassa ^a^V1.0278^ea^ yattha ruupaayatana.m nuppajjati tassa tattha dhammaayatana.m  na nirujjhissatiiti?
text.3495: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m aruupakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha ruupaayatana.m  nuppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha dhammaayatana.m na nirujjhissati.  parinibbantaana.m tesa.m tattha ruupaayatana~nca nuppajjati dhammaayatana~nca na  nirujjhissati.
text.3496: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha dhammaayatana.m na nirujjhissati  tassa tattha ruupaayatana.m nuppajjatiiti? aamantaa.
text.3497: [03] 247^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa yattha manaayatana.m nuppajjati tassa tattha  dhammaayatana.m na nirujjhissatiiti?
text.3498: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m acittakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  manaayatana.m nuppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha dhammaayatana.m na nirujjhissati.  parinibbantaana.m tesa.m tattha manaayatana~nca nuppajjati dhammaayatana~nca  na nirujjhissati.
text.3499: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha dhammaayatana.m na nirujjhissati  tassa tattha manaayatana.m nuppajjatiiti? aamantaa.
text.3502: [03] 248^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa cakkhaayatana.m uppajjittha tassa sotaayatana.m  nirujjhissatiiti?
text.3503: [03] pa~ncavokaare parinibbantaana.m aruupe pacchimabhavikaana.m ye ca ^a^T1.0261^ea^  aruupa.m upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti tesa.m cavantaana.m tesa.m  cakkhaayatana.m uppajjittha, no ca tesa.m sotaayatana.m nirujjhissati.  itaresa.m tesa.m cakkhaayatana~nca uppajjittha sotaayatana~nca nirujjhissati.
text.3504: [03] (kha) yassa ^a^V1.0279^ea^ vaa pana sotaayatana.m nirujjhissati tassa  cakkhaayatana.m uppajjitthaati? aamantaa.
text.3505: [03] (yathaa ^a^M1.0192^ea^ nirodhavaare atiitaanaagataa {atiitenaanaagataa (syaa0)} pucchaa yassakampi yatthakampi  yassayatthakampi anulomampi paccaniikampi vibhatta.m, eva.m  uppaadanirodhepi atiitaanaagataa pucchaa vibhajitabbaa.)
text.3510: [03] 249^b^.^eb^ (ka) yo cakkhaayatana.m parijaanaati so sotaayatana.m  parijaanaatiiti? aamantaa.
text.3511: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana sotaayatana.m parijaanaati so cakkhaayatana.m  parijaanaatiiti? aamantaa.
text.3512: [03] (ka) yo cakkhaayatana.m na parijaanaati so sotaayatana.m na  parijaanaatiiti? aamantaa.

text.3525: [03] 252^b^.^eb^ (ka) yo cakkhaayatana.m parijaanaati so sotaayatana.m  parijaanitthaati? no.
text.3526: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana sotaayatana.m parijaanittha so cakkhaayatana.m  parijaanaatiiti? no.
text.3527: [03] (ka) yo cakkhaayatana.m na parijaanaati so sotaayatana.m na  parijaanitthaati?
text.3528: [03] arahaa cakkhaayatana.m na parijaanaati, no ca sotaayatana.m na  parijaanittha. aggamaggasama"ngi~nca arahanta~nca .thapetvaa avasesaa  puggalaa cakkhaayatana~nca na parijaananti sotaayatana~nca na  parijaanittha.
text.3529: [03] (kha) yo ^a^V1.0281^ea^ vaa pana sotaayatana.m na parijaanittha so  cakkhaayatana.m na parijaanaatiiti?
text.3530: [03] aggamaggasama"ngii sotaayatana.m na parijaanittha, no ca  cakkhaayatana.m na parijaanaati. aggamaggasama"ngi~nca arahanta~nca .thapetvaa  avasesaa puggalaa sotaayatana~nca na parijaanittha cakkhaayatana~nca na  parijaananti.
text.3532: [03] 253^b^.^eb^ (ka) yo cakkhaayatana.m parijaanaati so sotaayatana.m  parijaanissatiiti? no.

text.3535: [03] ye magga.m pa.tilabhissanti te cakkhaayatana.m na parijaananti ^a^T1.0263^ea^, no  ca sotaayatana.m na parijaanissanti. arahaa ye ca puthujjanaa magga.m na  pa.tilabhissanti te cakkhaayatana~nca na parijaananti sotaayatana~nca na  parijaanissanti.

text.3792: [03] sacakkhukaana.m asotakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m cakkhudhaatu  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m sotadhaatu uppajjati. sacakkhukaana.m  sasotakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m cakkhudhaatu ca uppajjati sotadhaatu ca  uppajjati.

text.3797: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana ghaanadhaatu uppajjati tassa cakkhudhaatu  uppajjatiiti?
text.3798: [03] saghaanakaana.m acakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m ghaanadhaatu uppajjati,  no ca tesa.m cakkhudhaatu uppajjati. saghaanakaana.m sacakkhukaana.m  upapajjantaana.m tesa.m ghaanadhaatu ca uppajjati cakkhudhaatu ca uppajjati.

text.4006: [03] na saccaa na samudayasaccanti?...pe0... na saccaa na  nirodhasaccanti? aamantaa.
text.4011: [03] dukkhasacca.m sacca~nceva dukkhasacca~nca. avasesaa saccaa na  dukkhasacca.m.
text.4016: [03] maggasacca.m sacca~nceva maggasacca~nca. avasesaa saccaa na  maggasacca.m.

text.4030: [03] samudayasacca.m sacca~nceva samudayasacca~nca. avasesaa saccaa na  samudayasacca.m.
text.4033: [03] maggasacca.m sacca~nceva maggasacca~nca. avasesaa saccaa na  maggasacca.m.

text.4038: [03] nirodhasacca.m sacca~nceva nirodhasacca~nca. avasesaa saccaa na  nirodhasacca.m.
text.4041: [03] dukkha.m .thapetvaa avasesaa saccaa na dukkha.m, saccaa. dukkha~nca  sacca~nca .thapetvaa avasesaa na ceva dukkha.m na ca saccaa.
text.4044: [03] dukkha.m ^a^V1.0311^ea^ .thapetvaa avasesaa saccaa na dukkha.m, saccaa. dukkha~nca  sacca~nca .thapetvaa avasesaa na ceva dukkha.m na ca saccaa.

text.4052: [03] magga.m .thapetvaa avasesaa saccaa na maggo, saccaa. magga~nca  sacca~nca .thapetvaa avasesaa na ceva maggo na ca saccaa.
text.4055: [03] magga.m .thapetvaa avasesaa saccaa na maggo, saccaa. magga~nca  sacca~nca .thapetvaa avasesaa na ceva maggo na ca saccaa.
text.4062: [03] 27^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa ^a^V1.0312^ea^ dukkhasacca.m uppajjati tassa samudayasacca.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.4063: [03] sabbesa.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte ta.nhaavippayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne  tesa.m dukkhasacca.m uppajjati, no ca tesa.m samudayasacca.m uppajjati.  ta.nhaaya uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m ^a^M1.0213^ea^ dukkhasacca~nca uppajjati samudayasacca~nca  uppajjati.
text.4064: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana samudayasacca.m uppajjati tassa dukkhasacca.m  uppajjatiiti? aamantaa.
text.4065: [03] (ka) yassa dukkhasacca.m uppajjati tassa maggasacca.m uppajjatiiti?
text.4066: [03] sabbesa.m ^a^T1.0282^ea^ upapajjantaana.m pavatte maggavippayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne  tesa.m dukkhasacca.m uppajjati, no ca tesa.m maggasacca.m uppajjati.  pa~ncavokaare maggassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m dukkhasacca~nca uppajjati  maggasacca~nca uppajjati.
text.4067: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana maggasacca.m uppajjati tassa dukkhasacca.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.4068: [03] aruupe maggassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m maggasacca.m uppajjati, no ca  tesa.m dukkhasacca.m uppajjati. pa~ncavokaare maggassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m  maggasacca~nca uppajjati dukkhasacca~nca uppajjati.
text.4069: [03] 28^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa samudayasacca.m uppajjati tassa maggasacca.m  uppajjatiiti? no.
text.4070: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana maggasacca.m uppajjati tassa samudayasacca.m  uppajjatiiti? no.
text.4072: [03] 29^b^.^eb^ (ka) yattha ^a^V1.0313^ea^ dukkhasacca.m uppajjati tattha samudayasacca.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.4073: [03] asa~n~nasatte tattha dukkhasacca.m uppajjati, no ca tattha  samudayasacca.m uppajjati. catuvokaare pa~ncavokaare tattha dukkhasacca~nca  uppajjati samudayasacca~nca uppajjati.

text.4076: [03] apaaye asa~n~nasatte tattha dukkhasacca.m uppajjati, no ca tattha  maggasacca.m uppajjati. avasese catuvokaare pa~ncavokaare tattha  dukkhasacca~nca uppajjati maggasacca~nca uppajjati.

text.4082: [03] 31^b^.^eb^ yassa yattha dukkhasacca.m uppajjati tassa tattha  samudayasacca.m uppajjatiiti?...pe0....
text.4085: [03] 32^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa ^a^V1.0314^ea^ ^a^M1.0214^ea^ dukkhasacca.m nuppajjati tassa samudayasacca.m  nuppajjatiiti? aamantaa.
text.4086: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana samudayasacca.m nuppajjati tassa dukkhasacca.m  nuppajjatiiti?
text.4087: [03] sabbesa.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte ta.nhaavippayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne  tesa.m samudayasacca.m nuppajjati, no ca tesa.m dukkhasacca.m nuppajjati.  sabbesa.m cavantaana.m pavatte cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne aruupe maggassa ca  phalassa ca uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m samudayasacca~nca nuppajjati dukkhasacca~nca  nuppajjati.
text.4088: [03] (ka) yassa dukkhasacca.m nuppajjati tassa maggasacca.m nuppajjatiiti?
text.4089: [03] aruupe maggassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m dukkhasacca.m nuppajjati, no ca  tesa.m maggasacca.m nuppajjati. sabbesa.m cavantaana.m pavatte cittassa  bha"ngakkha.ne aruupe phalassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m dukkhasacca~nca nuppajjati  maggasacca~nca nuppajjati.
text.4090: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana maggasacca.m nuppajjati tassa ^a^T1.0284^ea^ dukkhasacca.m  nuppajjatiiti?
text.4091: [03] sabbesa.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte maggavippayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne  tesa.m maggasacca.m nuppajjati, no ca tesa.m dukkhasacca.m nuppajjati.  sabbesa.m cavantaana.m pavatte cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne aruupe phalassa  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m maggasacca~nca nuppajjati dukkhasacca~nca nuppajjati.
text.4092: [03] 33^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa samudayasacca.m nuppajjati tassa maggasacca.m  nuppajjatiiti?
text.4093: [03] maggassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m samudayasacca.m nuppajjati, no ca tesa.m  maggasacca.m nuppajjati. sabbesa.m cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne  ta.nhaavippayuttamaggavippayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne nirodhasamaapannaana.m  asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m samudayasacca~nca nuppajjati maggasacca~nca nuppajjati.
text.4094: [03] (kha) yassa ^a^V1.0315^ea^ vaa pana maggasacca.m nuppajjati tassa samudayasacca.m  nuppajjatiiti?
text.4095: [03] ta.nhaaya uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m maggasacca.m nuppajjati, no ca tesa.m  samudayasacca.m nuppajjati. sabbesa.m cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne  maggavippayuttata.nhaavippayuttacittassa {ta.nhaavippayuttamaggavippayuttacittassa (sii0) eva.m  puggalokaasepi nirodhavaarepi} uppaadakkha.ne nirodhasamaapannaana.m  asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m maggasacca~nca nuppajjati samudayasacca~nca nuppajjati.

text.4110: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha maggasacca.m nuppajjati tassa tattha  dukkhasacca.m nuppajjatiiti?

text.4124: [03] anabhisametaaviina.m tesa.m samudayasacca.m uppajjittha, no ca tesa.m  maggasacca.m uppajjittha. abhisametaaviina.m tesa.m samudayasacca~nca  uppajjittha maggasacca~nca uppajjittha.

text.4160: [03] 48^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa dukkhasacca.m uppajjissati tassa samudayasacca.m  uppajjissatiiti?
text.4161: [03] aggamaggasama"ngiina.m arahantaana.m yassa cittassa anantaraa  aggamagga.m pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m dukkhasacca.m uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m  samudayasacca.m uppajjissati. itaresa.m tesa.m dukkhasacca~nca uppajjissati  samudayasacca~nca ^a^T1.0290^ea^ uppajjissati.
text.4163: [03] (ka) yassa dukkhasacca.m uppajjissati tassa maggasacca.m  uppajjissatiiti?
text.4164: [03] aggamaggasama"ngiina.m arahantaana.m ye ca puthujjanaa magga.m na  pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m dukkhasacca.m uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m maggasacca.m  uppajjissati. yassa cittassa anantaraa aggamagga.m pa.tilabhissanti  ye ca~n~ne magga.m pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m dukkhasacca~nca uppajjissati  maggasacca~nca uppajjissati.
text.4166: [03] 49^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa samudayasacca.m uppajjissati tassa maggasacca.m  uppajjissatiiti?
text.4167: [03] ye puthujjanaa magga.m na pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m samudayasacca.m  uppajjissati ^a^V1.0321^ea^, no ca tesa.m maggasacca.m uppajjissati. ye magga.m  pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m samudayasacca~nca uppajjissati ^a^M1.0219^ea^ maggasacca~nca  uppajjissati.
text.4168: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana maggasacca.m uppajjissati tassa  samudayasacca.m uppajjissatiiti?

text.4173: [03] 51^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa yattha dukkhasacca.m uppajjissati tassa tattha  samudayasacca.m uppajjissatiiti?
text.4174: [03] aggamaggasama"ngiina.m arahantaana.m yassa cittassa anantaraa  aggamagga.m ^a^T1.0291^ea^ pa.tilabhissanti asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m tattha dukkhasacca.m  uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m tattha samudayasacca.m uppajjissati. itaresa.m  catuvokaaraana.m pa~ncavokaaraana.m tesa.m tattha dukkhasacca~nca uppajjissati  samudayasacca~nca uppajjissati.
text.4175: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha samudayasacca.m uppajjissati...pe0...  uppajjissatiiti? aamantaa.

text.4178: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha maggasacca.m uppajjissati tassa tattha  dukkhasacca.m uppajjissatiiti? aamantaa.

text.4180: [03] aapaayikaana.m ye ca puthujjanaa magga.m na pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m  tattha samudayasacca.m uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m tattha maggasacca.m  uppajjissati. ye magga.m pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m tattha samudayasacca~nca  uppajjissati maggasacca~nca uppajjissati.

text.4197: [03] 56^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa yattha dukkhasacca.m nuppajjissati tassa tattha  samudayasacca.m nuppajjissatiiti? aamantaa.
text.4198: [03] (kha) yassa ^a^V1.0324^ea^ vaa pana yattha samudayasacca.m nuppajjissati tassa  ^a^M1.0221^ea^ tattha dukkhasacca.m nuppajjissatiiti?

text.4209: [03] 58^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa ^a^V1.0325^ea^ dukkhasacca.m uppajjati tassa samudayasacca.m  uppajjitthaati? aamantaa.
text.4210: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana samudayasacca.m uppajjittha tassa dukkhasacca.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.4211: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m pavatte cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne aruupe maggassa ca  phalassa ca uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m samudayasacca.m uppajjittha, no ca tesa.m  dukkhasacca.m uppajjati. sabbesa.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte cittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m  samudayasacca~nca uppajjittha dukkhasacca~nca uppajjati.
text.4212: [03] (ka) yassa ^a^M1.0222^ea^ dukkhasacca.m uppajjati tassa maggasacca.m  uppajjitthaati? anabhisametaaviina.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte cittassa  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m dukkhasacca.m uppajjati, no ca tesa.m maggasacca.m  uppajjittha. abhisametaaviina.m ^a^T1.0295^ea^ upapajjantaana.m pavatte cittassa  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m dukkhasacca~nca uppajjati maggasacca~nca uppajjittha.
text.4213: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana maggasacca.m uppajjittha tassa dukkhasacca.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.4214: [03] abhisametaaviina.m cavantaana.m pavatte cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne aruupe  maggassa ca phalassa ca uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m maggasacca.m uppajjittha, no  ca tesa.m dukkhasacca.m uppajjati. abhisametaaviina.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte  cittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m maggasacca~nca uppajjittha dukkhasacca~nca  uppajjati.
text.4215: [03] 59^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa samudayasacca.m uppajjati tassa maggasacca.m  uppajjitthaati?
text.4216: [03] anabhisametaaviina.m ta.nhaaya uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m samudayasacca.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m maggasacca.m uppajjittha. abhisametaaviina.m  ta.nhaaya ^a^V1.0326^ea^ uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m samudayasacca~nca uppajjati maggasacca~nca  uppajjittha.
text.4217: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana maggasacca.m uppajjittha tassa samudayasacca.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.4218: [03] abhisametaaviina.m ta.nhaaya bha"ngakkha.ne ta.nhaavippayuttacitte vattamaane  nirodhasamaapannaana.m tesa.m maggasacca.m uppajjittha, no ca tesa.m samudayasacca.m  uppajjati. abhisametaaviina.m ta.nhaaya uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m maggasacca~nca  uppajjittha samudayasacca~nca uppajjati.

text.4223: [03] suddhaavaasaana.m upapatticittassa {uppatticittassa (syaa0)} uppaadakkha.ne asa~n~nasatta.m  upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha dukkhasacca.m uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha ^a^T1.0296^ea^  samudayasacca.m uppajjittha. itaresa.m catuvokaara.m pa~ncavokaara.m  upapajjantaana.m pavatte cittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha dukkhasacca~nca  uppajjati samudayasacca~nca uppajjittha.
