text.4270: [03] yassa cittassa anantaraa aggamagga.m pa.tilabhissanti tassa  cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne ye ca~n~ne magga.m pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m cavantaana.m  pavatte cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne aruupe maggassa ca phalassa ca  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m maggasacca.m ^a^T1.0302^ea^ uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m dukkhasacca.m  uppajjati. yassa cittassa anantaraa aggamagga.m pa.tilabhissanti  tassa cittassa uppaadakkha.ne ye ca~n~ne magga.m pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m  upapajjantaana.m pavatte cittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m maggasacca~nca  uppajjissati dukkhasacca~nca uppajjati.
text.4271: [03] 69^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa ^a^V1.0332^ea^ samudayasacca.m uppajjati tassa maggasacca.m  uppajjissatiiti?
text.4272: [03] ye puthujjanaa magga.m na pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m ta.nhaaya  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m samudayasacca.m uppajjati, no ca tesa.m maggasacca.m  uppajjissati. ye magga.m pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m ta.nhaaya uppaadakkha.ne  tesa.m samudayasacca~nca uppajjati maggasacca~nca uppajjissati.
text.4273: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana maggasacca.m uppajjissati tassa  samudayasacca.m uppajjatiiti?
text.4274: [03] yassa cittassa anantaraa aggamagga.m pa.tilabhissanti ye {pa.tilabhissanti tassa cittassa  uppaadakkha.ne ye (sii0 syaa0) puggalokaasavaarepi} ca~n~ne  magga.m pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m ta.nhaaya bha"ngakkha.ne ta.nhaavippayuttacitte  vattamaane nirodhasamaapannaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m maggasacca.m  uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m samudayasacca.m uppajjati. ye magga.m  pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m ta.nhaaya ^a^M1.0227^ea^ uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m maggasacca~nca  uppajjissati samudayasacca~nca uppajjati.
text.4278: [03] 71^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa yattha dukkhasacca.m uppajjati tassa tattha  samudayasacca.m uppajjissatiiti ^a^T1.0303^ea^?
text.4279: [03] aggamaggassa uppaadakkha.ne arahantaana.m cittassa uppaadakkha.ne  yassa cittassa anantaraa aggamagga.m pa.tilabhissanti tassa cittassa  uppaadakkha.ne asa~n~nasatta.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha dukkhasacca.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha samudayasacca.m uppajjissati. itaresa.m  catuvokaara.m pa~ncavokaara.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte cittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m  tattha dukkhasacca~nca uppajjati samudayasacca~nca uppajjissati.
text.4280: [03] (kha) yassa ^a^V1.0333^ea^ vaa pana yattha samudayasacca.m uppajjissati tassa  tattha dukkhasacca.m uppajjatiiti?
text.4281: [03] catuvokaaraa pa~ncavokaaraa cavantaana.m pavatte cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne  aruupe maggassa ca phalassa ca uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha samudayasacca.m  uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m tattha dukkhasacca.m uppajjati. catuvokaara.m  pa~ncavokaara.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte cittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha  samudayasacca~nca uppajjissati dukkhasacca~nca uppajjati.
text.4282: [03] (ka) yassa yattha dukkhasacca.m uppajjati tassa tattha maggasacca.m  uppajjissatiiti?
text.4283: [03] aggamaggassa uppaadakkha.ne arahantaana.m cittassa uppaadakkha.ne  aapaayikaana.m ye ca puthujjanaa magga.m na pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m  upapajjantaana.m pavatte cittassa uppaadakkha.ne asa~n~nasatta.m upapajjantaana.m  tesa.m tattha dukkhasacca.m uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha maggasacca.m  uppajjissati. yassa cittassa anantaraa aggamagga.m pa.tilabhissanti  tassa cittassa uppaadakkha.ne ye ca~n~ne magga.m pa.tilabhissanti ^a^T1.0304^ea^ tesa.m  upapajjantaana.m pavatte cittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha dukkhasacca~nca  uppajjati maggasacca~nca uppajjissati.
text.4284: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha maggasacca.m uppajjissati tassa tattha  dukkhasacca.m uppajjatiiti?

text.4287: [03] aapaayikaana.m ye ca puthujjanaa magga.m na pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m  ta.nhaaya uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha samudayasacca.m uppajjati, no ca tesa.m  tattha maggasacca.m uppajjissati. ye magga.m pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m  ta.nhaaya uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha samudayasacca~nca uppajjati maggasacca~nca  uppajjissati.
text.4288: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha maggasacca.m uppajjissati tassa tattha  samudayasacca.m uppajjatiiti?
text.4289: [03] yassa cittassa anantaraa aggamagga.m pa.tilabhissanti ye ca~n~ne  magga.m pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m ta.nhaaya bha"ngakkha.ne ^a^T1.0305^ea^ ta.nhaavippayuttacitte  vattamaane tesa.m tattha maggasacca.m uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m tattha  samudayasacca.m uppajjati. ye magga.m pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m ta.nhaaya  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha maggasacca~nca uppajjissati samudayasacca~nca  uppajjati.

text.4298: [03] aggamaggassa uppaadakkha.ne arahantaana.m cittassa uppaadakkha.ne ye  ca puthujjanaa magga.m na pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte  cittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m maggasacca.m nuppajjissati, no ca tesa.m  dukkhasacca.m nuppajjati. aggamaggassa bha"ngakkha.ne arahantaana.m cittassa  bha"ngakkha.ne ye ca puthujjanaa magga.m na pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m cavantaana.m  pavatte cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne aruupe aggamaggassa ca phalassa ca  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m maggasacca~nca nuppajjissati dukkhasacca~nca nuppajjati.

text.4302: [03] ye puthujjanaa magga.m na pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m ta.nhaaya  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m maggasacca.m nuppajjissati, no ca tesa.m samudayasacca.m  nuppajjati. aggamaggasama"ngiina.m arahantaana.m ye ca puthujjanaa magga.m na  pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m ta.nhaaya bha"ngakkha.ne ta.nhaavippayuttacitte vattamaane  tesa.m maggasacca~nca nuppajjissati samudayasacca~nca nuppajjati.
text.4306: [03] 76^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa ^a^M1.0230^ea^ yattha dukkhasacca.m nuppajjati tassa tattha  samudayasacca.m nuppajjissatiiti?
text.4307: [03] catuvokaaraa pa~ncavokaaraa cavantaana.m pavatte cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne  aruupe maggassa ca phalassa ca uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha dukkhasacca.m  nuppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha samudayasacca.m nuppajjissati.  aggamaggassa bha"ngakkha.ne arahantaana.m cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne yassa  cittassa anantaraa aggamagga.m pa.tilabhissanti tassa cittassa  bha"ngakkha.ne asa~n~nasattaa cavantaana.m aruupe aggamaggassa ca phalassa ca uppaadakkha.ne  tesa.m ^a^T1.0308^ea^ tattha dukkhasacca~nca nuppajjati  samudayasacca~nca nuppajjissati.

text.4339: [03] 82^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa yattha samudayasacca.m uppajjittha tassa tattha  maggasacca.m uppajjissatiiti?
text.4340: [03] aggamaggasama"ngiina.m arahantaana.m ye ca puthujjanaa magga.m na  pa.tilabhissanti aapaayikaana.m tesa.m tattha samudayasacca.m uppajjittha, no  ca tesa.m tattha maggasacca.m uppajjissati. yassa cittassa anantaraa  aggamagga.m pa.tilabhissanti ye ca~n~ne magga.m pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m tattha  samudayasacca~nca uppajjittha maggasacca~nca uppajjissati.
text.4341: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha maggasacca.m uppajjissati tassa tattha  samudayasacca.m uppajjitthaati?
text.4342: [03] suddhaavaasaana.m dutiye citte vattamaane tesa.m tattha maggasacca.m  uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m tattha samudayasacca.m uppajjittha. yassa  cittassa ^a^V1.0341^ea^ anantaraa aggamagga.m ^a^T1.0313^ea^ pa.tilabhissanti ye ca~n~ne magga.m  pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m tattha maggasacca~nca uppajjissati samudayasacca~nca  uppajjittha.
text.4344: [03] 83^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa dukkhasacca.m nuppajjittha tassa samudayasacca.m  nuppajjissatiiti? natthi.
text.4345: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana samudayasacca.m nuppajjissati tassa  dukkhasacca.m nuppajjitthaati? uppajjittha.
text.4346: [03] (ka) yassa dukkhasacca.m nuppajjittha tassa maggasacca.m  nuppajjissatiiti? natthi.
text.4347: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana maggasacca.m nuppajjissati tassa dukkhasacca.m  nuppajjitthaati? uppajjittha.

text.4358: [03] suddhaavaasaana.m dutiye citte vattamaane tesa.m tattha samudayasacca.m  nuppajjittha, no ca tesa.m tattha maggasacca.m nuppajjissati.  asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m tattha samudayasacca~nca nuppajjittha maggasacca~nca  nuppajjissati.
text.4359: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha maggasacca.m nuppajjissati tassa tattha  samudayasacca.m nuppajjitthaati?
text.4360: [03] aggamaggasama"ngiina.m arahantaana.m ye ca puthujjanaa magga.m na  pa.tilabhissanti aapaayikaana.m tesa.m tattha maggasacca.m nuppajjissati, no  ca tesa.m tattha samudayasacca.m nuppajjittha. asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m tattha  maggasacca~nca nuppajjissati samudayasacca~nca nuppajjittha.
text.4365: [03] 88^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa dukkhasacca.m nirujjhati tassa samudayasacca.m  nirujjhatiiti?
text.4366: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m pavatte ta.nhaavippayuttacittassa bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m  dukkhasacca.m ^a^V1.0343^ea^ nirujjhati, no ca tesa.m samudayasacca.m nirujjhati.  ta.nhaaya bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m dukkhasacca~nca nirujjhati samudayasacca~nca  nirujjhati.
text.4367: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana samudayasacca.m nirujjhati tassa dukkhasacca.m  nirujjhatiiti? aamantaa.
text.4368: [03] (ka) yassa dukkhasacca.m nirujjhati tassa maggasacca.m  nirujjhatiiti?
text.4369: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m pavatte maggavippayuttacittassa bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m  dukkhasacca.m nirujjhati, no ca tesa.m maggasacca.m nirujjhati.  pa~ncavokaare maggassa bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m dukkhasacca~nca nirujjhati  maggasacca~nca nirujjhati ^a^T1.0315^ea^.
text.4370: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana maggasacca.m nirujjhati tassa dukkhasacca.m  nirujjhatiiti?
text.4371: [03] aruupe maggassa bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m maggasacca.m nirujjhati, no  ^a^M1.0235^ea^ ca tesa.m dukkhasacca.m nirujjhati. pa~ncavokaare maggassa bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m  maggasacca~nca nirujjhati dukkhasacca~nca nirujjhati.
text.4372: [03] 89^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa samudayasacca.m nirujjhati tassa maggasacca.m  nirujjhatiiti? no.
text.4373: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana maggasacca.m nirujjhati tassa samudayasacca.m  nirujjhatiiti? no.
text.4375: [03] 90^b^.^eb^ yattha dukkhasacca.m nirujjhati tattha samudayasacca.m  nirujjhatiiti?
text.4377: [03] (yatthaka.m uppaadepi nirodhepi uppaadanirodhepi sadisa.m, natthi naanaakara.na.m).
text.4382: [03] 92^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa ^a^V1.0344^ea^ dukkhasacca.m na nirujjhati tassa  samudayasacca.m na nirujjhatiiti? aamantaa.
text.4383: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana samudayasacca.m na nirujjhati tassa  dukkhasacca.m na nirujjhatiiti?
text.4384: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m pavatte ta.nhaavippayuttacittassa bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m  samudayasacca.m na nirujjhati, no ca tesa.m dukkhasacca.m na nirujjhati.  sabbesa.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte cittassa uppaadakkha.ne aruupe maggassa ca  phalassa ca bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m samudayasacca~nca na nirujjhati  dukkhasacca~nca na nirujjhati.
text.4385: [03] (ka) yassa dukkhasacca.m na nirujjhati tassa maggasacca.m na  nirujjhatiiti?
text.4386: [03] aruupe ^a^T1.0316^ea^ maggassa bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m dukkhasacca.m na nirujjhati, no  ca tesa.m maggasacca.m na nirujjhati. sabbesa.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte  cittassa uppaadakkha.ne aruupe phalassa bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m dukkhasacca~nca  na nirujjhati maggasacca~nca na nirujjhati.
text.4387: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana maggasacca.m na nirujjhati tassa dukkhasacca.m  na nirujjhatiiti?
text.4388: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m pavatte maggavippayuttacittassa bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m  maggasacca.m na nirujjhati, no ca tesa.m dukkhasacca.m na nirujjhati.  sabbesa.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte cittassa uppaadakkha.ne ^a^M1.0236^ea^ aruupe phalassa  bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m maggasacca~nca na nirujjhati dukkhasacca~nca na  nirujjhati.
text.4389: [03] 93^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa samudayasacca.m na nirujjhati tassa  maggasacca.m na nirujjhatiiti?
text.4390: [03] maggassa bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m samudayasacca.m na nirujjhati, no ca  tesa.m maggasacca.m na nirujjhati. sabbesa.m cittassa uppaadakkha.ne  ta.nhaavippayuttamaggavippayuttacittassa bha"ngakkha.ne nirodhasamaapannaana.m  asa~n~nasattaana.m ^a^V1.0345^ea^ tesa.m samudayasacca~nca na nirujjhati maggasacca~nca na  nirujjhati.
text.4391: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana maggasacca.m na nirujjhati tassa  samudayasacca.m na nirujjhatiiti?
text.4392: [03] ta.nhaaya bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m maggasacca.m na nirujjhati, no ca tesa.m  samudayasacca.m na nirujjhati. sabbesa.m cittassa uppaadakkha.ne  maggavippayuttata.nhaavippayuttacittassa bha"ngakkha.ne nirodhasamaapannaana.m  asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m maggasacca~nca na nirujjhati samudayasacca~nca na  nirujjhati.
text.4397: [03] (yassakampi {yassakampi yatthakampi (sii0 syaa0)} yassayatthakampi sadisa.m, yassayatthakepi  nirodhasamaapannaananti ceta.m na kaatabba.m).
text.4400: [03] 96^b^.^eb^ yassa dukkhasacca.m nirujjhittha tassa samudayasacca.m  nirujjhitthaati? aamantaa.
text.4401: [03] (yathaa uppaadavaare atiitaa pucchaa anulomampi paccaniikampi  vibhattaa eva.m nirodhepi vibhajitabbaa, natthi naanaakara.na.m).
text.4404: [03] 97^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa ^a^V1.0346^ea^ ^a^M1.0237^ea^ dukkhasacca.m nirujjhissati tassa  samudayasacca.m nirujjhissatiiti?
text.4405: [03] aggamaggasama"ngiina.m arahantaana.m yassa cittassa anantaraa  aggamagga.m pa.tilabhissanti {pa.tilabhissanti tassa cittassa uppaadakkha.ne (sii0 syaa0)  uppaadavaare pana paa.thantara.m natthi} tesa.m dukkhasacca.m nirujjhissati, no ca  tesa.m samudayasacca.m nirujjhissati. itaresa.m tesa.m dukkhasacca~nca  nirujjhissati samudayasacca~nca nirujjhissati.
text.4407: [03] (ka) yassa dukkhasacca.m nirujjhissati tassa maggasacca.m  nirujjhissatiiti?
text.4408: [03] aggamaggassa bha"ngakkha.ne arahantaana.m ye ca puthujjanaa magga.m na  pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m dukkhasacca.m nirujjhissati, no ca tesa.m  maggasacca.m nirujjhissati. aggamaggassa uppaadakkha.ne yassa cittassa  anantaraa aggamagga.m pa.tilabhissanti ye ca~n~ne magga.m pa.tilabhissanti  tesa.m dukkhasacca~nca nirujjhissati maggasacca~nca nirujjhissati.
text.4410: [03] 98^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa samudayasacca.m nirujjhissati tassa  maggasacca.m nirujjhissatiiti?
text.4411: [03] ye puthujjanaa magga.m na pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m samudayasacca.m  nirujjhissati, no ca tesa.m maggasacca.m nirujjhissati. ye magga.m  pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m samudayasacca~nca nirujjhissati maggasacca~nca  nirujjhissati.
text.4412: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana maggasacca.m nirujjhissati tassa  samudayasacca.m nirujjhissatiiti?

text.4461: [03] suddhaavaasaana.m upapatticittassa bha"ngakkha.ne asa~n~nasattaa cavantaana.m  tesa.m tattha dukkhasacca.m nirujjhati, no ca tesa.m tattha samudayasacca.m  nirujjhittha. itaresa.m catuvokaaraa pa~ncavokaaraa cavantaana.m pavatte  cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m tattha dukkhasacca~nca nirujjhati  samudayasacca~nca nirujjhittha.

text.4463: [03] catuvokaara.m pa~ncavokaara.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte cittassa  uppaadakkha.ne aruupe maggassa ca ^a^T1.0323^ea^ phalassa ca bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m tattha  samudayasacca.m nirujjhittha, no ca tesa.m tattha dukkhasacca.m nirujjhati.  catuvokaaraa pa~ncavokaaraa cavantaana.m pavatte cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m  tattha samudayasacca~nca nirujjhittha dukkhasacca~nca nirujjhati.
text.4464: [03] (ka) yassa yattha dukkhasacca.m nirujjhati tassa tattha maggasacca.m  nirujjhitthaati?
text.4465: [03] suddhaavaasaana.m upapatticittassa bha"ngakkha.ne anabhisametaaviina.m  cavantaana.m ^a^V1.0352^ea^ pavatte cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne asa~n~nasattaa cavantaana.m tesa.m tattha  dukkhasacca.m nirujjhati, no ca tesa.m tattha maggasacca.m nirujjhittha.  abhisametaaviina.m cavantaana.m pavatte cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m tattha  dukkhasacca~nca nirujjhati maggasacca~nca nirujjhittha.
text.4466: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha maggasacca.m nirujjhittha tassa tattha  dukkhasacca.m nirujjhatiiti?
text.4467: [03] abhisametaaviina.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte cittassa uppaadakkha.ne  aruupe maggassa ca phalassa ca bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m tattha maggasacca.m  nirujjhittha, no ca tesa.m tattha dukkhasacca.m nirujjhati.  abhisametaaviina.m cavantaana.m pavatte cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m tattha  maggasacca~nca nirujjhittha dukkhasacca~nca nirujjhati.
text.4468: [03] 110^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa yattha samudayasacca.m nirujjhati tassa tattha  maggasacca.m nirujjhitthaati?
text.4469: [03] anabhisametaaviina.m ta.nhaaya bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m tattha samudayasacca.m  nirujjhati, no ca tesa.m tattha maggasacca.m nirujjhittha.  abhisametaaviina.m ta.nhaaya bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m tattha samudayasacca~nca  nirujjhati maggasacca~nca ^a^T1.0324^ea^ nirujjhittha.
text.4470: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha maggasacca.m nirujjhittha tassa tattha  samudayasacca.m nirujjhatiiti?
text.4471: [03] abhisametaaviina.m ta.nhaaya uppaadakkha.ne ta.nhaavippayuttacitte  vattamaane tesa.m tattha maggasacca.m nirujjhittha, no ca tesa.m tattha  samudayasacca.m nirujjhati. abhisametaaviina.m ta.nhaaya bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m  tattha maggasacca~nca nirujjhittha samudayasacca~nca nirujjhati.
text.4473: [03] 111^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa dukkhasacca.m na nirujjhati tassa  samudayasacca.m na nirujjhitthaati? nirujjhittha.
text.4474: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana samudayasacca.m na nirujjhittha tassa  dukkhasacca.m na nirujjhatiiti? natthi.
text.4475: [03] (ka) yassa ^a^V1.0353^ea^ ^a^M1.0242^ea^ dukkhasacca.m na nirujjhati tassa maggasacca.m na  nirujjhitthaati?
text.4476: [03] abhisametaaviina.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte cittassa uppaadakkha.ne  aruupe maggassa ca phalassa ca bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m dukkhasacca.m na  nirujjhati, no ca tesa.m maggasacca.m na nirujjhittha.  anabhisametaaviina.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte cittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m  dukkhasacca~nca na nirujjhati maggasacca~nca na nirujjhittha.
text.4477: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana maggasacca.m na nirujjhittha tassa  dukkhasacca.m na nirujjhatiiti?
text.4478: [03] anabhisametaaviina.m cavantaana.m pavatte cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m  maggasacca.m na nirujjhittha, no ca tesa.m dukkhasacca.m na nirujjhati.  anabhisametaaviina.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte cittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m  maggasacca~nca na nirujjhittha dukkhasacca~nca na nirujjhati.
text.4479: [03] 112^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa ^a^T1.0325^ea^ samudayasacca.m na nirujjhati tassa maggasacca.m  na nirujjhitthaati?
text.4480: [03] abhisametaaviina.m ta.nhaaya uppaadakkha.ne ta.nhaavippayuttacitte  vattamaane nirodhasamaapannaana.m tesa.m samudayasacca.m na nirujjhati, no ca  tesa.m maggasacca.m na nirujjhittha. anabhisametaaviina.m ta.nhaaya  uppaadakkha.ne ta.nhaavippayuttacitte vattamaane asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m  samudayasacca~nca na nirujjhati maggasacca~nca na nirujjhittha.
text.4481: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana maggasacca.m na nirujjhittha tassa  samudayasacca.m na nirujjhatiiti?
text.4482: [03] anabhisametaaviina.m ta.nhaaya bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m maggasacca.m na  nirujjhittha, no ca tesa.m samudayasacca.m na nirujjhati.  anabhisametaaviina.m ta.nhaaya uppaadakkha.ne ta.nhaavippayuttacitte vattamaane  asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m maggasacca~nca na nirujjhittha samudayasacca~nca na  nirujjhati.
text.4486: [03] 114^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa yattha dukkhasacca.m na nirujjhati tassa  tattha samudayasacca.m na nirujjhitthaati?
text.4487: [03] catuvokaara.m pa~ncavokaara.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte cittassa  uppaadakkha.ne aruupe maggassa ca phalassa ca bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m tattha  dukkhasacca.m na nirujjhati, no ca tesa.m tattha samudayasacca.m na  nirujjhittha. suddhaavaasaana.m upapatticittassa uppaadakkha.ne asa~n~nasatta.m  upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha dukkhasacca~nca na nirujjhati samudayasacca~nca  na nirujjhittha.
text.4488: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha ^a^M1.0243^ea^ samudayasacca.m na nirujjhittha tassa  tattha dukkhasacca.m na nirujjhatiiti?
text.4489: [03] suddhaavaasaana.m upapatticittassa bha"ngakkha.ne ^a^T1.0326^ea^ asa~n~nasattaa cavantaana.m  tesa.m tattha samudayasacca.m na nirujjhittha, no ca tesa.m tattha dukkhasacca.m  na nirujjhati. suddhaavaasaana.m upapatticittassa uppaadakkha.ne  asa~n~nasatta.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha samudayasacca~nca na nirujjhittha  dukkhasacca~nca na nirujjhati.
text.4490: [03] (ka) yassa yattha dukkhasacca.m na nirujjhati tassa tattha  maggasacca.m na nirujjhitthaati?
text.4491: [03] abhisametaaviina.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte cittassa uppaadakkha.ne  aruupe maggassa ca phalassa ca bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m tattha dukkhasacca.m na  nirujjhati, no ca tesa.m tattha maggasacca.m na nirujjhittha.  suddhaavaasaana.m upapatticittassa uppaadakkha.ne anabhisametaaviina.m  upapajjantaana.m pavatte cittassa ^a^V1.0355^ea^ uppaadakkha.ne asa~n~nasatta.m upapajjantaana.m  tesa.m tattha dukkhasacca~nca na nirujjhati maggasacca~nca na nirujjhittha.
text.4492: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha maggasacca.m na nirujjhittha tassa  tattha dukkhasacca.m na nirujjhatiiti?
text.4493: [03] suddhaavaasaana.m upapatticittassa bha"ngakkha.ne anabhisametaaviina.m  cavantaana.m pavatte cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne asa~n~nasattaa cavantaana.m tesa.m tattha  maggasacca.m na nirujjhittha, no ca tesa.m tattha dukkhasacca.m na  nirujjhati. suddhaavaasaana.m upapatticittassa uppaadakkha.ne  anabhisametaaviina.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte cittassa uppaadakkha.ne  asa~n~nasatta.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha maggasacca~nca na nirujjhittha  dukkhasacca~nca na nirujjhati.
text.4494: [03] 115^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa yattha samudayasacca.m na nirujjhati tassa  tattha maggasacca.m na ^a^T1.0327^ea^ nirujjhitthaati?
text.4495: [03] abhisametaaviina.m ta.nhaaya uppaadakkha.ne ta.nhaavippayuttacitte  vattamaane tesa.m tattha samudayasacca.m na nirujjhati, no ca tesa.m tattha  maggasacca.m na nirujjhittha. suddhaavaasaana.m dutiye citte vattamaane  anabhisametaaviina.m ta.nhaaya uppaadakkha.ne ta.nhaavippayuttacitte vattamaane  asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m tattha samudayasacca~nca na nirujjhati maggasacca~nca  na nirujjhittha.
text.4496: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha maggasacca.m na nirujjhittha tassa  tattha samudayasacca.m na nirujjhatiiti?
text.4497: [03] anabhisametaaviina.m ta.nhaaya bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m tattha maggasacca.m na  nirujjhittha, no ca tesa.m tattha samudayasacca.m na nirujjhati.  suddhaavaasaana.m dutiye citte vattamaane anabhisametaaviina.m ta.nhaaya  uppaadakkha.ne ta.nhaavippayuttacitte vattamaane asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m tattha  maggasacca~nca na nirujjhittha samudayasacca~nca na nirujjhati.
text.4500: [03] 116^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa ^a^V1.0356^ea^ ^a^M1.0244^ea^ dukkhasacca.m nirujjhati tassa samudayasacca.m  nirujjhissatiiti?
text.4501: [03] aggamaggassa bha"ngakkha.ne arahantaana.m cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne yassa  cittassa anantaraa aggamagga.m pa.tilabhissanti tassa cittassa  bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m dukkhasacca.m nirujjhati, no ca tesa.m samudayasacca.m  nirujjhissati. itaresa.m cavantaana.m pavatte cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m  dukkhasacca~nca nirujjhati samudayasacca~nca nirujjhissati.
text.4502: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana samudayasacca.m nirujjhissati tassa  dukkhasacca.m nirujjhatiiti?
text.4503: [03] sabbesa.m upapajjantaana.m ^a^T1.0328^ea^ pavatte cittassa uppaadakkha.ne aruupe  maggassa ca phalassa ca bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m samudayasacca.m nirujjhissati,  no ca tesa.m dukkhasacca.m nirujjhati. sabbesa.m cavantaana.m pavatte  cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m samudayasacca~nca nirujjhissati dukkhasacca~nca  nirujjhati.
text.4504: [03] (ka) yassa dukkhasacca.m nirujjhati tassa maggasacca.m  nirujjhissatiiti?
text.4505: [03] aggamaggassa bha"ngakkha.ne arahantaana.m cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne ye ca  puthujjanaa magga.m na pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m cavantaana.m pavatte cittassa  bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m dukkhasacca.m nirujjhati, no ca tesa.m maggasacca.m  nirujjhissati. yassa cittassa anantaraa aggamagga.m pa.tilabhissanti  tassa cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne ye ca~n~ne magga.m pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m  cavantaana.m pavatte cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m dukkhasacca~nca nirujjhati  maggasacca~nca nirujjhissati.
text.4506: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana maggasacca.m nirujjhissati tassa  dukkhasacca.m nirujjhatiiti?
text.4507: [03] aggamaggassa uppaadakkha.ne yassa cittassa anantaraa aggamagga.m  pa.tilabhissanti ^a^V1.0357^ea^ tassa cittassa uppaadakkha.ne ye ca~n~ne magga.m  pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte cittassa uppaadakkha.ne aruupe  maggassa ca phalassa ca bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m maggasacca.m nirujjhissati,  no ca tesa.m dukkhasacca.m nirujjhati. yassa cittassa anantaraa  aggamagga.m pa.tilabhissanti tassa cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne ye ca~n~ne magga.m  pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m cavantaana.m pavatte cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m  maggasacca~nca nirujjhissati dukkhasacca~nca nirujjhati.

text.4509: [03] ye puthujjanaa magga.m na pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m ta.nhaaya bha"ngakkha.ne  tesa.m samudayasacca.m ^a^M1.0245^ea^ nirujjhati, no ca tesa.m maggasacca.m nirujjhissati.  ye magga.m pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m ta.nhaaya bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m  samudayasacca~nca nirujjhati maggasacca~nca nirujjhissati.
text.4510: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana maggasacca.m nirujjhissati tassa  samudayasacca.m nirujjhatiiti?
text.4511: [03] aggamaggassa uppaadakkha.ne yassa cittassa anantaraa aggamagga.m  pa.tilabhissanti ye ca~n~ne magga.m pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m ta.nhaaya  uppaadakkha.ne ta.nhaavippayuttacitte vattamaane nirodhasamaapannaana.m  asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m maggasacca.m nirujjhissati, no ca tesa.m  samudayasacca.m nirujjhati. ye magga.m pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m ta.nhaaya  bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m maggasacca~nca nirujjhissati samudayasacca~nca  nirujjhati.

text.4533: [03] aggamaggassa uppaadakkha.ne yassa cittassa anantaraa aggamagga.m  pa.tilabhissanti tassa cittassa uppaadakkha.ne ye ca~n~ne magga.m  pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte cittassa uppaadakkha.ne aruupe  maggassa ca phalassa ca bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m dukkhasacca.m na nirujjhati,  no ca tesa.m maggasacca.m na nirujjhissati. arahantaana.m cittassa  uppaadakkha.ne ye ca puthujjanaa magga.m na pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m ^a^T1.0333^ea^  upapajjantaana.m pavatte cittassa uppaadakkha.ne aruupe aggamaggassa ca  phalassa ca bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m dukkhasacca~nca na nirujjhati maggasacca~nca  na nirujjhissati.

text.4535: [03] aggamaggassa bha"ngakkha.ne arahantaana.m cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne ye ca  puthujjanaa ^a^V1.0361^ea^ magga.m na pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m cavantaana.m pavatte cittassa  bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m maggasacca.m na nirujjhissati, no ca tesa.m dukkhasacca.m  na nirujjhati. arahantaana.m cittassa uppaadakkha.ne ye ca puthujjanaa  magga.m na pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte cittassa  uppaadakkha.ne aruupe aggamaggassa ca phalassa ca bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m  maggasacca~nca na nirujjhissati dukkhasacca~nca na nirujjhati.
text.4536: [03] 122^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa samudayasacca.m na nirujjhati tassa  maggasacca.m na nirujjhissatiiti?
text.4537: [03] aggamaggassa uppaadakkha.ne yassa cittassa anantaraa aggamagga.m  pa.tilabhissanti ye ca~n~ne magga.m pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m ta.nhaaya  uppaadakkha.ne ta.nhaavippayuttacitte vattamaane nirodhasamaapannaana.m  asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m samudayasacca.m na nirujjhati, no ca tesa.m maggasacca.m  na nirujjhissati. aggamaggassa bha"ngakkha.ne arahantaana.m ye ca  puthujjanaa magga.m na pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m ta.nhaaya ^a^M1.0248^ea^ uppaadakkha.ne  ta.nhaavippayuttacitte vattamaane tesa.m samudayasacca~nca na nirujjhati  maggasacca~nca na nirujjhissati.
text.4538: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana maggasacca.m na nirujjhissati tassa ^a^T1.0334^ea^  samudayasacca.m na nirujjhatiiti?
text.4539: [03] ye puthujjanaa magga.m na pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m ta.nhaaya bha"ngakkha.ne  tesa.m maggasacca.m na nirujjhissati, no ca tesa.m samudayasacca.m na  nirujjhati. aggamaggassa bha"ngakkha.ne arahantaana.m ye ca puthujjanaa  magga.m na pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m ta.nhaaya uppaadakkha.ne  ta.nhaavippayuttacitte vattamaane {vattamaane, nirodhasamaapannaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m (sii0 syaa0)} tesa.m maggasacca~nca na nirujjhissati  samudayasacca~nca na nirujjhati.
text.4543: [03] 124^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa yattha dukkhasacca.m na nirujjhati tassa  tattha samudayasacca.m na nirujjhissatiiti?
text.4544: [03] catuvokaara.m pa~ncavokaara.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte cittassa  uppaadakkha.ne aruupe maggassa ca phalassa ca bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m tattha  dukkhasacca.m na nirujjhati, no ca tesa.m tattha samudayasacca.m na  nirujjhissati. aggamaggassa uppaadakkha.ne arahantaana.m cittassa  uppaadakkha.ne yassa cittassa anantaraa aggamagga.m pa.tilabhissanti  tassa cittassa uppaadakkha.ne asa~n~nasatta.m upapajjantaana.m aruupe aggamaggassa ca phalassa ca  bha"ngakkha.ne asa~n~nasatta.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha dukkhasacca~nca na  nirujjhati samudayasacca~nca na nirujjhissati.
text.4545: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha samudayasacca.m na nirujjhissati  tassa tattha dukkhasacca.m na nirujjhatiiti?
text.4546: [03] aggamaggassa bha"ngakkha.ne arahantaana.m cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne yassa  cittassa anantaraa aggamagga.m pa.tilabhissanti tassa cittassa  bha"ngakkha.ne asa~n~nasattaa cavantaana.m tesa.m tattha samudayasacca.m na  nirujjhissati, no ca tesa.m tattha ^a^T1.0335^ea^ dukkhasacca.m na nirujjhati.  aggamaggassa uppaadakkha.ne arahantaana.m cittassa uppaadakkha.ne yassa  cittassa anantaraa aggamagga.m pa.tilabhissanti tassa cittassa  uppaadakkha.ne aruupe aggamaggassa ca phalassa ca bha"ngakkha.ne  asa~n~nasatta.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha samudayasacca~nca na nirujjhissati  dukkhasacca~nca na nirujjhati.
text.4547: [03] (ka) yassa yattha dukkhasacca.m na nirujjhati tassa tattha  maggasacca.m na nirujjhissatiiti?
text.4548: [03] aggamaggassa ^a^V1.0363^ea^ uppaadakkha.ne yassa cittassa anantaraa aggamagga.m  pa.tilabhissanti tassa ^a^M1.0249^ea^ cittassa uppaadakkha.ne ye ca~n~ne magga.m  pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte cittassa uppaadakkha.ne aruupe  maggassa ca phalassa ca bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m tattha dukkhasacca.m na  nirujjhati, no ca tesa.m tattha maggasacca.m na nirujjhissati.  arahantaana.m cittassa uppaadakkha.ne aapaayikaana.m ye ca puthujjanaa magga.m  na pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte cittassa uppaadakkha.ne  asa~n~nasatta.m upapajjantaana.m  aruupe aggamaggassa ca phalassa ca bha"ngakkha.ne  tesa.m tattha dukkhasacca~nca na nirujjhati maggasacca~nca na  nirujjhissati.
text.4549: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha maggasacca.m na nirujjhissati tassa  tattha dukkhasacca.m na nirujjhatiiti?
text.4550: [03] aggamaggassa bha"ngakkha.ne arahantaana.m cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne  aapaayikaana.m ye ca puthujjanaa magga.m na pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m cavantaana.m  pavatte cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne asa~n~nasattaa cavantaana.m tesa.m tattha maggasacca.m  na nirujjhissati, no ca tesa.m tattha dukkhasacca.m ^a^T1.0336^ea^ na nirujjhati.  arahantaana.m cittassa uppaadakkha.ne aapaayikaana.m ye ca puthujjanaa magga.m  na pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte cittassa uppaadakkha.ne  aruupe aggamaggassa ca phalassa ca bha"ngakkha.ne asa~n~nasatta.m  upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha maggasacca~nca na nirujjhissati dukkhasacca~nca  na nirujjhati.

text.4554: [03] aapaayikaana.m ye ca puthujjanaa magga.m na pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m  ta.nhaaya bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m tattha maggasacca.m na nirujjhissati, no ca  tesa.m tattha samudayasacca.m na nirujjhati. aggamaggassa bha"ngakkha.ne  arahantaana.m aapaayikaana.m ye ca puthujjanaa magga.m na pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m  ta.nhaaya uppaadakkha.ne ta.nhaavippayuttacitte vattamaane asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m  tattha ^a^T1.0337^ea^ maggasacca~nca na nirujjhissati samudayasacca~nca na nirujjhiti.

text.4617: [03] 140^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa dukkhasacca.m nuppajjati tassa samudayasacca.m  na nirujjhatiiti?
text.4618: [03] ta.nhaaya bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m dukkhasacca.m nuppajjati, no ca tesa.m  samudayasacca.m na nirujjhati. sabbesa.m cavantaana.m pavatte  ta.nhaavippayuttacittassa bha"ngakkha.ne aruupe maggassa ca phalassa ca  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m dukkhasacca~nca nuppajjati samudayasacca~nca  ^a^M1.0254^ea^ na nirujjhati.

text.4620: [03] sabbesa.m ^a^T1.0342^ea^ upapajjantaana.m pavatte cittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m  samudayasacca.m na nirujjhati, no ca tesa.m dukkhasacca.m nuppajjati.  sabbesa.m cavantaana.m pavatte ta.nhaavippayuttacittassa bha"ngakkha.ne aruupe  maggassa ca phalassa ca uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m samudayasacca~nca na  nirujjhati dukkhasacca~nca nuppajjati.
text.4621: [03] (ka) yassa dukkhasacca.m nuppajjati tassa maggasacca.m na  nirujjhatiiti?

text.4623: [03] (kha) yassa ^a^V1.0371^ea^ vaa pana maggasacca.m na nirujjhati tassa dukkhasacca.m  nuppajjatiiti?

text.4625: [03] 141^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa samudayasacca.m nuppajjati tassa maggasacca.m na  nirujjhatiiti?
text.4626: [03] maggassa bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m samudayasacca.m nuppajjati, no ca tesa.m  maggasacca.m na nirujjhati. ta.nhaavippayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne  maggavippayuttacittassa bha"ngakkha.ne nirodhasamaapannaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m  samudayasacca~nca nuppajjati maggasacca~nca na nirujjhati.
text.4627: [03] (kha) yassa vaa ^a^T1.0343^ea^ pana maggasacca.m na nirujjhati tassa  samudayasacca.m nuppajjatiiti?
text.4628: [03] ta.nhaaya uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m maggasacca.m na nirujjhati, no ca  tesa.m samudayasacca.m nuppajjati. maggavippayuttacittassa bha"ngakkha.ne  ta.nhaavippayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne nirodhasamaapannaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m  tesa.m maggasacca~nca na nirujjhati samudayasacca~nca nuppajjati.
text.4633: [03] (yassakampi yassayatthakampi sadisa.m, yassayatthakepi  nirodhasamaapannaananti na kaatabba.m).
text.4636: [03] 144^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa ^a^V1.0372^ea^ ^a^M1.0255^ea^ dukkhasacca.m uppajjittha tassa samudayasacca.m  nirujjhitthaati? aamantaa.
text.4638: [03] (atiitaa pucchaa yathaa uppaadavaare vibhattaa eva.m  uppaadanirodhavaarepi anulomampi paccaniikampi vibhajitabba.m).
text.4641: [03] 145^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa dukkhasacca.m uppajjissati tassa  samudayasacca.m nirujjhissatiiti?
text.4642: [03] aggamaggasama"ngiina.m arahantaana.m yassa cittassa anantaraa  aggamagga.m pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m dukkhasacca.m uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m  samudayasacca.m nirujjhissati. itaresa.m tesa.m dukkhasacca~nca  uppajjissati samudayasacca~nca nirujjhissati.
text.4644: [03] (ka) yassa ^a^T1.0344^ea^ dukkhasacca.m uppajjissati tassa maggasacca.m  nirujjhissatiiti?
text.4645: [03] aggamaggassa bha"ngakkha.ne arahantaana.m ye ca puthujjanaa magga.m na  pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m dukkhasacca.m uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m maggasacca.m  nirujjhissati. aggamaggassa uppaadakkha.ne yassa cittassa anantaraa  aggamagga.m pa.tilabhissanti ye ca~n~ne magga.m pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m  dukkhasacca~nca uppajjissati maggasacca~nca nirujjhissati.
text.4647: [03] 146^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa ^a^V1.0373^ea^ samudayasacca.m uppajjissati tassa maggasacca.m  nirujjhissatiiti?
text.4648: [03] ye puthujjanaa magga.m na pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m samudayasacca.m  uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m maggasacca.m nirujjhissati. ye magga.m  pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m samudayasacca~nca uppajjissati maggasacca~nca  nirujjhissati.
text.4649: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana maggasacca.m nirujjhissati tassa  samudayasacca.m uppajjissatiiti?
text.4650: [03] aggamaggassa uppaadakkha.ne yassa cittassa anantaraa aggamagga.m  pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m maggasacca.m nirujjhissati, no ca tesa.m  samudayasacca.m uppajjissati. ye magga.m pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m  maggasacca~nca nirujjhissati samudayasacca~nca uppajjissati.
text.4654: [03] 148^b^.^eb^ yassa yattha dukkhasacca.m uppajjissati tassa tattha  samudayasacca.m nirujjhissatiiti?
text.4655: [03] aggamaggasama"ngiina.m arahantaana.m yassa cittassa anantaraa  aggamagga.m pa.tilabhissanti asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m tattha ^a^T1.0345^ea^ ...pe0... itaresa.m  catuvokaaraana.m pa~ncavokaaraana.m tesa.m tattha...pe0.... (yassakampi  yassayatthakampi sadisa.m).
text.4657: [03] 149^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa dukkhasacca.m nuppajjissati tassa  samudayasacca.m na nirujjhissatiiti? aamantaa.
text.4658: [03] (kha) yassa ^a^V1.0374^ea^ vaa pana samudayasacca.m na nirujjhissati tassa  dukkhasacca.m nuppajjissatiiti?
text.4659: [03] aggamaggasama"ngiina.m arahantaana.m yassa cittassa anantaraa  aggamagga.m pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m samudayasacca.m na nirujjhissati, no  ca tesa.m dukkhasacca.m nuppajjissati. pacchimacittasama"ngiina.m tesa.m  samudayasacca~nca na nirujjhissati dukkhasacca~nca nuppajjissati.
text.4660: [03] (ka) yassa dukkhasacca.m nuppajjissati tassa maggasacca.m na  nirujjhissatiiti? aamantaa.
text.4661: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana maggasacca.m na nirujjhissati tassa  dukkhasacca.m nuppajjissatiiti?
text.4662: [03] aggamaggassa bha"ngakkha.ne arahantaana.m ye ca puthujjanaa magga.m na  pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m maggasacca.m na nirujjhissati, no ca tesa.m  dukkhasacca.m nuppajjissati. pacchimacittasama"ngiina.m tesa.m maggasacca~nca  na nirujjhissati dukkhasacca~nca nuppajjissati.
text.4663: [03] 150^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa samudayasacca.m nuppajjissati tassa maggasacca.m  na nirujjhissatiiti?
text.4664: [03] aggamaggassa uppaadakkha.ne yassa cittassa anantaraa aggamagga.m  pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m samudayasacca.m nuppajjissati, no ca tesa.m  maggasacca.m na nirujjhissati. aggamaggassa bha"ngakkha.ne arahantaana.m  tesa.m samudayasacca~nca ^a^T1.0346^ea^ nuppajjissati maggasacca~nca na nirujjhissati.
text.4665: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana maggasacca.m na nirujjhissati tassa  samudayasacca.m nuppajjissatiiti?
text.4666: [03] ye puthujjanaa magga.m na pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m maggasacca.m na  nirujjhissati, no ca tesa.m samudayasacca.m nuppajjissati.  aggamaggassa bha"ngakkha.ne ^a^M1.0257^ea^ arahantaana.m tesa.m maggasacca~nca na  nirujjhissati samudayasacca~nca nuppajjissati.
text.4671: [03] (yassakampi yassayatthakampi sadisa.m, samudayasacca.m maggasacca.m  naanaakara.na.m, aggamaggassa bha"ngakkha.ne, arahantaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m  tattha maggasacca~nca na nirujjhissati samudayasacca~nca nuppajjissati).
text.4674: [03] 153^b^.^eb^ yassa dukkhasacca.m uppajjati tassa samudayasacca.m  nirujjhitthaati? aamantaa.
text.4676: [03] (paccuppannaatiitaa {paccuppannenaatiitaa (syaa0)} pucchaa uppaadavaarepi uppaadanirodhavaarepi  yassakampi yatthakampi yassayatthakampi anulomampi paccaniikampi  sadisa.m, asammohantena vibhajitabbaa).
text.4679: [03] 154^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa dukkhasacca.m uppajjati tassa samudayasacca.m  nirujjhissatiiti?
text.4680: [03] aggamaggassa uppaadakkha.ne arahantaana.m cittassa uppaadakkha.ne  yassa cittassa anantaraa aggamagga.m pa.tilabhissanti tassa cittassa  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m dukkhasacca.m uppajjati, no ca tesa.m samudayasacca.m ^a^T1.0347^ea^  nirujjhissati. itaresa.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte cittassa uppaadakkha.ne  tesa.m dukkhasacca~nca uppajjati samudayasacca~nca nirujjhissati.
text.4681: [03] (kha) yassa ^a^V1.0376^ea^ vaa pana samudayasacca.m nirujjhissati tassa  dukkhasacca.m uppajjatiiti?
text.4682: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m pavatte cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne aruupe maggassa ca  phalassa ^a^M1.0258^ea^ ca uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m samudayasacca.m nirujjhissati, no ca  tesa.m dukkhasacca.m uppajjati. sabbesa.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte cittassa  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m samudayasacca~nca nirujjhissati dukkhasacca~nca  uppajjati.
text.4683: [03] (ka) yassa dukkhasacca.m uppajjati tassa maggasacca.m  nirujjhissatiiti?
text.4684: [03] arahantaana.m cittassa uppaadakkha.ne ye ca puthujjanaa magga.m na  pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte cittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m  dukkhasacca.m uppajjati, no ca tesa.m maggasacca.m nirujjhissati.  aggamaggassa uppaadakkha.ne yassa cittassa anantaraa aggamagga.m  pa.tilabhissanti tassa cittassa uppaadakkha.ne ye ca~n~ne magga.m  pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte cittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m  dukkhasacca~nca uppajjati maggasacca~nca nirujjhissati.
text.4685: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana maggasacca.m nirujjhissati tassa  dukkhasacca.m uppajjatiiti?
text.4686: [03] yassa cittassa anantaraa aggamagga.m pa.tilabhissanti tassa  cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne ye ca~n~ne magga.m pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m cavantaana.m  pavatte cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne aruupe maggassa ca phalassa ca  uppaadakkha.ne ^a^T1.0348^ea^ tesa.m maggasacca.m nirujjhissati, no ca tesa.m dukkhasacca.m  uppajjati. aggamaggassa uppaadakkha.ne yassa cittassa anantaraa  aggamagga.m pa.tilabhissanti tassa cittassa uppaadakkha.ne ye ca~n~ne magga.m  pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte cittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m  maggasacca~nca nirujjhissati dukkhasacca~nca uppajjati.
text.4687: [03] 155^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa samudayasacca.m uppajjati tassa maggasacca.m  nirujjhissatiiti?
text.4688: [03] ye puthujjanaa magga.m na pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m ta.nhaaya  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m samudayasacca.m uppajjati, no ca tesa.m maggasacca.m  nirujjhissati. ye ^a^V1.0377^ea^ magga.m pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m ta.nhaaya uppaadakkha.ne  tesa.m samudayasacca~nca uppajjati maggasacca~nca nirujjhissati.
text.4689: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana maggasacca.m nirujjhissati tassa  samudayasacca.m uppajjatiiti?
text.4690: [03] aggamaggassa uppaadakkha.ne yassa cittassa anantaraa aggamagga.m  pa.tilabhissanti ye ca~n~ne magga.m pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m ta.nhaaya  bha"ngakkha.ne ta.nhaavippayuttacitte vattamaane nirodhasamaapannaana.m  asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m maggasacca.m nirujjhissati, no ca tesa.m  samudayasacca.m uppajjati. ye magga.m pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m ta.nhaaya  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m maggasacca~nca nirujjhissati samudayasacca~nca  uppajjati.
text.4694: [03] 157^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa ^a^M1.0259^ea^ yattha dukkhasacca.m uppajjati tassa tattha  samudayasacca.m ^a^T1.0349^ea^ nirujjhissatiiti?
text.4695: [03] aggamaggassa uppaadakkha.ne arahantaana.m cittassa uppaadakkha.ne  yassa cittassa anantaraa aggamagga.m pa.tilabhissanti tassa cittassa  uppaadakkha.ne asa~n~nasatta.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha dukkhasacca.m...pe0...  itaresa.m catuvokaara.m pa~ncavokaara.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte cittassa  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha dukkhasacca.m...pe0....
text.4696: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha samudayasacca.m nirujjhissati tassa  tattha dukkhasacca.m uppajjatiiti?
text.4697: [03] catuvokaaraa pa~ncavokaaraa cavantaana.m pavatte cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne  aruupe maggassa ca phalassa ca uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha samudayasacca.m  nirujjhissati, no ca tesa.m tattha dukkhasacca.m uppajjati. catuvokaara.m  pa~ncavokaara.m ^a^V1.0378^ea^ upapajjantaana.m pavatte cittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha  samudayasacca~nca nirujjhissati dukkhasacca~nca uppajjati.
text.4698: [03] (ka) yassa yattha dukkhasacca.m uppajjati tassa tattha maggasacca.m  nirujjhissatiiti?
text.4699: [03] arahantaana.m cittassa uppaadakkha.ne aapaayikaana.m ye ca puthujjanaa  magga.m na pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte cittassa  uppaadakkha.ne asa~n~nasatta.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha dukkhasacca.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha maggasacca.m nirujjhissati.  aggamaggassa uppaadakkha.ne yassa cittassa anantaraa aggamagga.m  pa.tilabhissanti tassa cittassa uppaadakkha.ne ye ca~n~ne magga.m  pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m upapajjantaana.m ^a^T1.0350^ea^ pavatte cittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m  tattha dukkhasacca~nca uppajjati maggasacca~nca nirujjhissati.
text.4700: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha maggasacca.m nirujjhissati tassa  tattha dukkhasacca.m uppajjatiiti?
text.4701: [03] yassa cittassa anantaraa aggamagga.m pa.tilabhissanti tassa  cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne ye ca~n~ne magga.m pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m cavantaana.m  pavatte cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne aruupe maggassa ca phalassa ca  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha maggasacca.m nirujjhissati, no ca tesa.m tattha  dukkhasacca.m uppajjati. aggamaggassa uppaadakkha.ne yassa cittassa  anantaraa aggamagga.m pa.tilabhissanti tassa cittassa uppaadakkha.ne ye  ca~n~ne magga.m pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte cittassa  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha maggasacca~nca nirujjhissati dukkhasacca~nca  uppajjati.
text.4702: [03] 158^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa yattha samudayasacca.m uppajjati tassa tattha  maggasacca.m nirujjhissatiiti?
text.4703: [03] aapaayikaana.m ye ca puthujjanaa magga.m na pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m  ta.nhaaya uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha samudayasacca.m uppajjati, no ca  ^a^M1.0260^ea^ tesa.m tattha maggasacca.m nirujjhissati. ye magga.m pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m  ta.nhaaya uppaadakkha.ne ^a^V1.0379^ea^ tesa.m tattha samudayasacca~nca uppajjati maggasacca~nca  nirujjhissati.
text.4704: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha maggasacca.m nirujjhissati tassa  tattha samudayasacca.m uppajjatiiti?
text.4705: [03] aggamaggassa uppaadakkha.ne yassa cittassa anantaraa aggamagga.m  pa.tilabhissanti ^a^T1.0351^ea^ ye ca~n~ne magga.m pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m ta.nhaaya  bha"ngakkha.ne ta.nhaavippayuttacitte vattamaane tesa.m tattha maggasacca.m  nirujjhissati, no ca tesa.m tattha samudayasacca.m uppajjati. ye magga.m  pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m ta.nhaaya uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha maggasacca~nca  nirujjhissati samudayasacca~nca uppajjati.
text.4707: [03] 159^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa dukkhasacca.m nuppajjati tassa samudayasacca.m  na nirujjhissatiiti?
text.4708: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m pavatte cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne aruupe maggassa ca  phalassa ca uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m dukkhasacca.m nuppajjati, no ca tesa.m  samudayasacca.m na nirujjhissati. aggamaggassa bha"ngakkha.ne arahantaana.m  cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne yassa cittassa anantaraa aggamagga.m  pa.tilabhissanti tassa cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne aruupe aggamaggassa ca  phalassa ca uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m dukkhasacca~nca nuppajjati samudayasacca~nca  na nirujjhissati.
text.4709: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana samudayasacca.m na nirujjhissati tassa  dukkhasacca.m nuppajjatiiti?
text.4710: [03] aggamaggassa uppaadakkha.ne arahantaana.m cittassa uppaadakkha.ne  yassa cittassa anantaraa aggamagga.m pa.tilabhissanti tassa cittassa  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m samudayasacca.m na nirujjhissati, no ca tesa.m  dukkhasacca.m nuppajjati. aggamaggassa bha"ngakkha.ne arahantaana.m cittassa  bha"ngakkha.ne yassa cittassa anantaraa aggamagga.m pa.tilabhissanti tassa  cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne aruupe aggamaggassa ca phalassa ca uppaadakkha.ne  tesa.m samudayasacca~nca na nirujjhissati dukkhasacca~nca ^a^T1.0352^ea^ nuppajjati.
text.4711: [03] (ka) yassa dukkhasacca.m nuppajjati tassa maggasacca.m na  nirujjhissatiiti?
text.4712: [03] yassa cittassa anantaraa aggamagga.m pa.tilabhissanti tassa  cittassa ^a^V1.0380^ea^ bha"ngakkha.ne ye ca~n~ne magga.m pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m cavantaana.m  pavatte cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne aruupe maggassa ca phalassa ca  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m dukkhasacca.m nuppajjati, no ca tesa.m maggasacca.m na  nirujjhissati. aggamaggassa bha"ngakkha.ne arahantaana.m cittassa  bha"ngakkha.ne ye ca puthujjanaa magga.m na pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m ^a^M1.0261^ea^ cavantaana.m  pavatte cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne aruupe aggaphalassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m  dukkhasacca~nca nuppajjati maggasacca~nca na nirujjhissati.
text.4713: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana maggasacca.m na nirujjhissati tassa  dukkhasacca.m nuppajjatiiti?
text.4714: [03] arahantaana.m cittassa uppaadakkha.ne ye ca puthujjanaa magga.m na  pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte cittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m  maggasacca.m na nirujjhissati, no ca tesa.m dukkhasacca.m nuppajjati.  aggamaggassa bha"ngakkha.ne arahantaana.m cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne ye ca  puthujjanaa magga.m na pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m cavantaana.m pavatte cittassa  bha"ngakkha.ne aruupe aggaphalassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m maggasacca~nca na  nirujjhissati dukkhasacca~nca nuppajjati.
text.4715: [03] 160^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa samudayasacca.m nuppajjati tassa maggasacca.m na  nirujjhissatiiti?
text.4716: [03] aggamaggassa uppaadakkha.ne yassa cittassa anantaraa aggamagga.m ^a^T1.0353^ea^  pa.tilabhissanti ye ca~n~ne magga.m pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m ta.nhaaya  bha"ngakkha.ne ta.nhaavippayuttacitte vattamaane nirodhasamaapannaana.m  asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m samudayasacca.m nuppajjati, no ca tesa.m maggasacca.m na  nirujjhissati. aggamaggassa bha"ngakkha.ne arahantaana.m ye ca puthujjanaa  magga.m na pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m ta.nhaaya bha"ngakkha.ne ta.nhaavippayuttacitte  vattamaane tesa.m samudayasacca~nca nuppajjati maggasacca~nca na  nirujjhissati.
text.4717: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana maggasacca.m na nirujjhissati tassa  samudayasacca.m nuppajjatiiti?
text.4718: [03] ye puthujjanaa magga.m na pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m ta.nhaaya  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m ^a^V1.0381^ea^ maggasacca.m na nirujjhissati, no ca tesa.m  samudayasacca.m nuppajjati. aggamaggassa bha"ngakkha.ne arahantaana.m ye ca  puthujjanaa magga.m na pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m ta.nhaaya bha"ngakkha.ne  ta.nhaavippayuttacitte vattamaane tesa.m maggasacca~nca na nirujjhissati  samudayasacca~nca nuppajjati.
text.4722: [03] 162^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa yattha dukkhasacca.m nuppajjati tassa tattha  samudayasacca.m na nirujjhissatiiti?
text.4723: [03] catuvokaaraa pa~ncavokaaraa cavantaana.m pavatte cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne  aruupe maggassa ca phalassa ca uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha dukkhasacca.m  nuppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha samudayasacca.m na nirujjhissati.  aggamaggassa ^a^M1.0262^ea^ bha"ngakkha.ne arahantaana.m cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne yassa  cittassa ^a^T1.0354^ea^ anantaraa aggamagga.m pa.tilabhissanti tassa cittassa  bha"ngakkha.ne aruupe aggamaggassa ca phalassa ca uppaadakkha.ne  asa~n~nasattaa cavantaana.m tesa.m tattha dukkhasacca~nca nuppajjati  samudayasacca~nca na nirujjhissati.
text.4724: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha samudayasacca.m na nirujjhissati  tassa tattha dukkhasacca.m nuppajjatiiti?
text.4725: [03] aggamaggassa uppaadakkha.ne arahantaana.m cittassa uppaadakkha.ne  yassa cittassa anantaraa aggamagga.m pa.tilabhissanti tassa cittassa  uppaadakkha.ne asa~n~nasatta.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha samudayasacca.m na  nirujjhissati, no ca tesa.m tattha dukkhasacca.m nuppajjati.  aggamaggassa bha"ngakkha.ne arahantaana.m cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne yassa  cittassa anantaraa aggamagga.m pa.tilabhissanti tassa cittassa  bha"ngakkha.ne aruupe aggamaggassa ^a^V1.0382^ea^ ca phalassa ca uppaadakkha.ne  asa~n~nasattaa cavantaana.m tesa.m tattha samudayasacca~nca na nirujjhissati  dukkhasacca~nca nuppajjati.
text.4726: [03] (ka) yassa yattha dukkhasacca.m nuppajjati tassa tattha maggasacca.m  na nirujjhissatiiti?
text.4727: [03] yassa cittassa anantaraa aggamagga.m pa.tilabhissanti tassa  cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne ye ca~n~ne magga.m pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m cavantaana.m  pavatte cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne aruupe maggassa ca phalassa ca  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha dukkhasacca.m nuppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha  maggasacca.m na nirujjhissati. aggamaggassa bha"ngakkha.ne arahantaana.m  cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne aapaayikaana.m ye ca puthujjanaa magga.m na  pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m cavantaana.m pavatte cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne aruupe  aggaphalassa ^a^T1.0355^ea^ uppaadakkha.ne asa~n~nasattaa {apaayaa asa~n~nasattaa (syaa0)} cavantaana.m   tesa.m tattha dukkhasacca~nca nuppajjati maggasacca~nca na nirujjhissati.
text.4728: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha maggasacca.m na nirujjhissati tassa  tattha dukkhasacca.m nuppajjatiiti?
text.4729: [03] arahantaana.m cittassa uppaadakkha.ne aapaayikaana.m ye ca puthujjanaa  magga.m na pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte cittassa  uppaadakkha.ne asa~n~nasatta.m {apaaya.m asa~n~nasatta.m (syaa0)} upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha maggasacca.m na  nirujjhissati, no ca tesa.m tattha dukkhasacca.m nuppajjati.  aggamaggassa bha"ngakkha.ne arahantaana.m cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne aapaayikaana.m  ye ca puthujjanaa magga.m na pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m cavantaana.m pavatte  cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne aruupe aggaphalassa uppaadakkha.ne asa~n~nasattaa  cavantaana.m tesa.m tattha maggasacca~nca na nirujjhissati dukkhasacca~nca  nuppajjati.
text.4730: [03] 163^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa ^a^M1.0263^ea^ yattha samudayasacca.m nuppajjati tassa tattha  maggasacca.m na nirujjhissatiiti?
text.4731: [03] aggamaggassa uppaadakkha.ne yassa cittassa anantaraa aggamagga.m  pa.tilabhissanti ye ca~n~ne magga.m pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m ta.nhaaya  bha"ngakkha.ne ta.nhaavippayuttacitte ^a^V1.0383^ea^ vattamaane tesa.m tattha samudayasacca.m  nuppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha maggasacca.m na nirujjhissati.  aggamaggassa bha"ngakkha.ne arahantaana.m aapaayikaana.m ye ca puthujjanaa magga.m  na pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m ta.nhaaya bha"ngakkha.ne ta.nhaavippayuttacitte  vattamaane asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m tattha samudayasacca~nca nuppajjati  maggasacca~nca na nirujjhissati.
text.4732: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha maggasacca.m ^a^T1.0356^ea^ na nirujjhissati tassa  tattha samudayasacca.m nuppajjatiiti?
text.4733: [03] aapaayikaana.m ye ca puthujjanaa magga.m na pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m  ta.nhaaya uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha maggasacca.m na nirujjhissati, no ca  tesa.m tattha samudayasacca.m nuppajjati. aggamaggassa bha"ngakkha.ne  arahantaana.m aapaayikaana.m ye ca puthujjanaa magga.m na pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m  ta.nhaaya bha"ngakkha.ne ta.nhaavippayuttacitte vattamaane asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m  tattha maggasacca~nca na nirujjhissati samudayasacca~nca nuppajjati.
text.4736: [03] 164^b^.^eb^ yassa dukkhasacca.m uppajjittha tassa samudayasacca.m  nirujjhissatiiti?
text.4737: [03] (yathaa nirodhavaare atiitaanaagataa {atiitenaanaagataa (syaa0)} pucchaa anulomampi  paccaniikampi vibhattaa eva.m uppaadanirodhavaarepi asammohantena  vibhajitabba.m).
text.4742: [03] 165^b^.^eb^ (ka) yo ^a^V1.0384^ea^ dukkhasacca.m parijaanaati so samudayasacca.m  pajahatiiti? aamantaa.
text.4743: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana samudayasacca.m pajahati so dukkhasacca.m  parijaanaatiiti? aamantaa.
text.4744: [03] (ka) yo ^a^M1.0264^ea^ dukkhasacca.m na parijaanaati so samudayasacca.m  nappajahatiiti? aamantaa.
text.4747: [03] 166^b^.^eb^ (ka) yo ^a^T1.0357^ea^ dukkhasacca.m parijaanittha so samudayasacca.m  pajahitthaati? aamantaa.
text.4749: [03] (ka) yo dukkhasacca.m na parijaanittha so samudayasacca.m  nappajahitthaati? aamantaa.
text.4752: [03] 167^b^.^eb^ (ka) yo dukkhasacca.m parijaanissati so samudayasacca.m  pajahissatiiti? aamantaa.
text.4754: [03] (ka) yo ^a^V1.0385^ea^ dukkhasacca.m na parijaanissati so samudayasacca.m  nappajahissatiiti? aamantaa.
text.4757: [03] 168^b^.^eb^ (ka) yo dukkhasacca.m parijaanaati so samudayasacca.m  pajahitthaati? no.
text.4758: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana samudayasacca.m pajahittha so dukkhasacca.m  parijaanaatiiti? no.
text.4759: [03] (ka) yo dukkhasacca.m na parijaanaati so samudayasacca.m  nappajahitthaati?
text.4760: [03] arahaa dukkhasacca.m na parijaanaati, no ca samudayasacca.m  nappajahittha. aggamaggasama"ngi~nca arahanta~nca .thapetvaa avasesaa  puggalaa dukkhasacca~nca na parijaananti samudayasacca~nca nappajahittha.
text.4761: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana samudayasacca.m nappajahittha so dukkhasacca.m na  parijaanaatiiti?
text.4762: [03] aggamaggasama"ngii samudayasacca.m nappajahittha, no ca dukkhasacca.m  na parijaanaati. aggamaggasama"ngi~nca arahanta~nca .thapetvaa avasesaa  puggalaa samudayasacca~nca nappajahittha dukkhasacca~nca na parijaananti.
text.4764: [03] 169^b^.^eb^ (ka) yo ^a^T1.0358^ea^ dukkhasacca.m parijaanaati so samudayasacca.m  pajahissatiiti? no.
text.4765: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana samudayasacca.m pajahissati so dukkhasacca.m  parijaanaatiiti? no.
text.4766: [03] (ka) yo ^a^M1.0265^ea^ dukkhasacca.m na parijaanaati so samudayasacca.m  nappajahissatiiti?
text.4767: [03] ye magga.m pa.tilabhissanti te dukkhasacca.m na parijaananti, no  ca samudayasacca.m nappajahissanti. arahaa ye ca puthujjanaa magga.m na  pa.tilabhissanti ^a^V1.0386^ea^ te dukkhasacca~nca na parijaananti samudayasacca~nca  nappajahissanti.
text.4768: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana samudayasacca.m nappajahissati so dukkhasacca.m  na parijaanaatiiti?
text.4769: [03] aggamaggasama"ngii samudayasacca.m nappajahissati, no ca  dukkhasacca.m na parijaanaati. arahaa ye ca puthujjanaa magga.m na  pa.tilabhissanti te samudayasacca~nca nappajahissanti dukkhasacca~nca na  parijaananti.
text.4771: [03] 170^b^.^eb^ (ka) yo dukkhasacca.m parijaanittha so samudayasacca.m  pajahissatiiti? no.
text.4772: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana samudayasacca.m pajahissati so dukkhasacca.m  parijaanitthaati? no.
text.4773: [03] (ka) yo dukkhasacca.m na parijaanittha so samudayasacca.m  nappajahissatiiti?
text.4774: [03] ye magga.m pa.tilabhissanti te dukkhasacca.m na parijaanittha, no  ca te samudayasacca.m nappajahissanti. aggamaggasama"ngii ye ca  puthujjanaa magga.m na pa.tilabhissanti te dukkhasacca~nca na parijaanittha  samudayasacca~nca nappajahissanti.
text.4775: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana samudayasacca.m nappajahissati so dukkhasacca.m  na parijaanitthaati?
text.4776: [03] arahaa samudayasacca.m nappajahissati, no ca dukkhasacca.m na  parijaanittha. aggamaggasama"ngii ye ca puthujjanaa magga.m na  pa.tilabhissanti te ^a^T1.0359^ea^ samudayasacca~nca nappajahissanti dukkhasacca~nca na  parijaanittha.

author: Not available
originalTitle: Namo Tassa Bhagavato Arahato Sammaasambuddhassa: Abhidhammapitake
